Business_spcService.Comments: 20140125:PPB Collections, barring incorporated WIP. 20140110:PPB Retrofitted for SCMS,20140225:Incorporated System Barring/Unbarrinf/Suspend/Resume.
Business_spcService.Name: TM BS Product Utility App

Business_spcService_spcMethod.Comments: 20140129:PPB Function to cancel the future dated orders for a given asset identified by integration id
Business_spcService_spcMethod.Name: CancelFDO

Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Comments: Integration Id of the asset, future dated orders for which are to be cancelled.
Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Name: Integration Id

Business_spcService_spcMethod.Comments: 20110809:PPB Method for modify order creation, WIP, exepected to replace EDR processing
Business_spcService_spcMethod.Name: CreateModifyOrder

Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Comments: 20110809:PPB Action code for the TBD product, Add/New, Delete
Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Name: Action Code

Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Comments: 20110809:PPB Error Code of the overall execution, will be OK else some value indicating the error occurred
Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Name: Error Code

Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Comments: 20110809:PPB Detailed Error Message if error has occurred in the execution
Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Name: Error Message

Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Comments: 20110809:PPB External reference for the modify order, this will get stamped in the S_usORDER.INTEGRATION_usID
Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Name: Ext Ref Id

Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Comments: 20110809:PPB MSISDN of the subscription on which the modify order is to be created and executed
Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Name: MSISDN

Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Comments: 20110809:PPB Part Number/Code of the product to be altered, refered to as TBD product, Name or Code is mandatory
Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Name: Product Code

Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Comments: 20110809:PPB Name of the product to be altered, refered to as TBD product, Name or Code is mandatory
Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Name: Product Name

Business_spcService_spcMethod.Comments: 20110727:PPB A method to extract the product structure from the product master configuration, it generates an output propertyset representing the product hierarchy in the given root product
Business_spcService_spcMethod.Name: GetPortsOfProduct

Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Comments: 20110727:PPB Name of the file to which product hierarchy is to be stored/saved
Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Name: FileName

Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Comments: 20110727:PPB Row Id of the root product, structure of which is to be exported, either Id or Name must be provided
Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Name: Product Id

Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Comments: 20110727:PPB Name of the root product, structure of which is to be exported, either Id or Name must be provided
Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Name: Product Name

Business_spcService_spcMethod.Comments: 20110727:PPB Method to create and process prepaid bulk provisioning order starting with MSISDN, SIM:SIM Type, Plan Name and Reservation Token as inputs
Business_spcService_spcMethod.Name: ProcessPrepaidOrder

Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Comments: 20110809:PPB Error Code if error has occurred in the execution, else OK or null value
Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Name: Error Code

Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Comments: 20110809:PPB Detailed Error Message if error has occurred in the execution
Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Name: Error Message

Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Comments: 20110809:PPB Cell Phone number for which the pre-created account, contact, address, invoice profile, order and order line items are to be created.
Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Name: MSISDN

Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Comments: 20110809:PPB Name of the plan to be setup on the number being pre-activated, this needs to be same as the Favourite created in Siebel, using which the provide order gets created and processed.
Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Name: Plan Name

Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Comments: 20110809:PPB Reservation token provided by BRM when the MSISDN gets reserved for the purpose of order capture.
Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Name: Reservation Token

Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Comments: 20110809:PPB SIM number and SIMType separated with : SIM type values can be VMT / Vodafone Money Transfer interpreted as VMT or anything else considered as non-VMT
Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Name: SIM

Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Comments: 20110809:PPB By default the order created by this method is submitted to external systems, set this input argument as N or No if the order is not to be submitted.
Business_spcService_spcMethod_spcArg.Name: Submit Order

Business_spcService_spcMethod.Comments: 20140626 : MV : published this method for auto resumption date stamping
Business_spcService_spcMethod.Name: UpdateOLI

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function func_usCreateActivity(Inputs,Outputs) _newline{ _newline//mandatory inputs: AccountId, Type, AssignTo_newline//[Type] = 'Call - Outbound', [Description]='Call customer for outstanding payment and possible barring if not paid'_newline var strErrCode = "OK"; _newline var strErrMesg = ""; _newline var strSRId = ""; _newline var strAccId = Inputs.GetProperty("AccId"); _newline var strActivityType = Inputs.GetProperty("ActivityType"); //e.g. "Call - Outbound"_newline var strActivityDesc = Inputs.GetProperty("ActivityDesc");_newline var boAcc:BusObject = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Account"); _newline var bcAcc:BusComp = boAcc.GetBusComp("Account");_newline var bcAction:BusComp = boAcc.GetBusComp("Action");_newline var status = TheApplication().InvokeMethod("LookupValue","EVENT_usSTATUS","Ready To Assign");_newline bcAcc.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline bcAcc.ActivateField("Account Number"); _newline_newline strActivityDesc = "Call customer for outstanding payment and possible barring if not paid";_newline bcAcc.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcAcc.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strAccId + "'"); _newline bcAcc.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline if(bcAcc.FirstRecord()) _newline { _newline bcAction.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline bcAction.ActivateField("Type"); _newline bcAction.ActivateField("Comment");_newline bcAction.ActivateField("Primary Owned By"); _newline bcAction.ActivateField("Class"); _newline bcAction.ActivateField("Status"); _newline bcAction.ActivateField("Location");_newline bcAction.NewRecord(NewAfter); _newline bcAction.SetFieldValue("Comment", strActivityDesc); _newline bcAction.SetFieldValue("Type", strActivityType); _newline bcAction.SetFieldValue("Status", status); _newline _newline //SK:QC4049:09-Aug12_newline //bcAction.SetFieldValue("Class", "Billing_usCollections"); //SK:Commented this line._newline bcAction.SetFieldValue("Class","Request"); //Setting UI field Category_newline bcAction.SetFieldValue("Call Type","Account Management"); //Setting UI field Sub-Category_newline bcAction.SetFieldValue("Objective","Collections"); //Setting UI field Topic_newline bcAction.SetFieldValue("Location","System"); //Setting UI field Location_newline_newline bcAction.SetFieldValue("Primary Owned By","COLLECTIONS_usQUEUE"); _newline bcAction.WriteRecord(); _newline } _newline else _newline { _newline strErrCode = "Account Not Found"; _newline strErrMesg = "Account not found. strAccNum=" + strAccNum + "." ; _newline }_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", strErrCode); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", strErrMesg); _newline return CancelOperation; _newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: CreateActivity

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function func_usDisconnect(Inputs,Outputs) _newline{ _newline//mandatory inputs: AccountId, MSISDN_newline//[Type] = 'Call - Outbound', [Description]='Disconnect the MSISDN'_newline var strErrCode = "OK"; _newline var strErrMesg = ""; _newline var strSRId = ""; _newline var strAccId = Inputs.GetProperty("AccId"); _newline var strActivityType = Inputs.GetProperty("ActivityType"); //e.g. "Call - Outbound"_newline var vMSISDN = Inputs.GetProperty("MSISDN"); _newline var strActivityDesc;_newline var boAcc:BusObject = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Account"); _newline var bcAcc:BusComp = boAcc.GetBusComp("Account");_newline var bcAction:BusComp = boAcc.GetBusComp("Action");_newline var status = TheApplication().InvokeMethod("LookupValue","EVENT_usSTATUS","Ready To Assign");_newline bcAcc.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline bcAcc.ActivateField("Account Number"); _newline_newline strActivityDesc = "Disconnect the MSISDN - " + vMSISDN; _newline bcAcc.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcAcc.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strAccId + "'"); _newline bcAcc.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline if(bcAcc.FirstRecord()) _newline { _newline bcAction.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline bcAction.ActivateField("Type"); _newline bcAction.ActivateField("Description");_newline bcAction.ActivateField("Primary Owned By"); _newline bcAction.ActivateField("Status"); _newline bcAction.ActivateField("Type");_newline bcAction.ActivateField("Class");_newline bcAction.ActivateField("Location");_newline bcAction.NewRecord(NewAfter); _newline bcAction.SetFieldValue("Comment", strActivityDesc); //SK QC4049. Setting Comment field instead of Description._newline bcAction.SetFieldValue("Status", status); _newline bcAction.SetFieldValue("Primary Owned By", "COLLECTIONS_usQUEUE"); _newline _newline_newline //SK: QC4049: 09Aug12_newline //bcAction.SetFieldValue("Type", strActivityType); //SK: Commented this redundant line_newline bcAction.SetFieldValue("Type","Internal");_newline //bcAction.SetFieldValue("Class","Request_usDisconnection"); //SK: Commented this line._newline bcAction.SetFieldValue("Class","Requests"); //Setting UI field Category_newline bcAction.SetFieldValue("Call Type","Account Management"); //Setting UI field Sub-Category_newline bcAction.SetFieldValue("Objective","Disconnection"); //Setting UI field Topic_newline bcAction.SetFieldValue("Location","System"); //Setting UI field Location_newline_newline bcAction.WriteRecord();_newline } _newline else _newline { _newline strErrCode = "Account Not Found"; _newline strErrMesg = "Account not found. strAccNum=" + strAccNum + "." ; _newline }_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", strErrCode); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", strErrMesg); _newline return CancelOperation; _newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: Disconnect

Business_spcService_spcScript.Comments: 20110929:Enhanced to search based on parent product
Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function GetDetailsOfLooseProductInstance(Inputs,Outputs)_newline{_newline/*_newlineFor a given product by name, find the values of key fields as below and send out in Outputs_newlineName of the Parent Product_newlineProd Item Id - PortValidProdId_newlineProduct Port Id - AssemblyPortId_newlineInternally uses a ProductPort propset for the root product_newline20110929:Enhanced to search based on parent product_newline*/_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Parent Product Id", "");_newline// Outputs.SetProperty("Parent Product Name", "");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Prod Item Id", "");//PortValidProdId_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Product Port Id", "");//AssemblyPortId_newline var strRootProdName = Inputs.GetProperty("Root Product Name");_newline var strChildProdName = Inputs.GetProperty("Child Product Name");_newline var strProdFileName = NormFileName("AllPorts_us" + strRootProdName + ".xml");_newline var psIp:PropertySet = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline var psOp:PropertySet = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline var bs1:Service = TheApplication().GetService("EAI XML Read from File");_newline/*_newlineGet prod structure details in a propset, this is supported by a BSM : _newline<GetAllPortsSimple>_newline<Product IsDefault="Y" PortProductName="Email Bundle" RootProductId="1-5EA7N" PortValidProdId="1-W0YXG" ProductId="1-5EA7N" PortProductId="1-4VTVL" PortName="Email Product" AssemblyPortId="1-W0YXG"></Product>_newline<Product IsDefault="" PortProductName="WiMax Service Bundle" RootProductId="1-5EA7N" PortValidProdId="1-23N9VG" ProductId="1-5EA7N" PortProductId="1-23N9N6" PortName="Internet Service" AssemblyPortId="1-W4FZ5"></Product>_newline</GetAllPortsSimple>_newline*/_newline var psProd:PropertySet = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline psIp.SetProperty("FileName",strServerPath + NormFileName(strProdFileName))_newline_newline try_newline {_newline bs1.InvokeMethod("ReadPropSet",psIp,psProd);_newline }_newline catch (e)//since the file was not found, excute the BS that generates the file_newline {_newline bs1 = TheApplication().GetService("TM BS Product Utility App");_newline psIp.SetProperty("Product Name",strRootProdName);_newline bs1.InvokeMethod("GetPortsOfProduct",psIp,psProd);//this method writes to a file for next time use and also returns the propset_newline psProd=psProd.GetChild(0);_newline }_newline Outputs.SetProperty("ProductCount",psProd.GetChildCount());_newline var strParProdName = Inputs.GetProperty("Parent Product Name");_newline var strPortProductIdForParent = "";_newline var strKeyName = "PortProductName";_newline var strKeyValue = strChildProdName; _newline if("" != strParProdName)//_newline {_newline strPortProductIdForParent = GetPropsetFieldByKey(psProd, "PortProductId", "PortProductName", strParProdName);_newline_newline if("" != strPortProductIdForParent)_newline {_newline strKeyName = strKeyName + ":ProductId";_newline strKeyValue = strKeyValue + ":" + strPortProductIdForParent;_newline }_newline }_newline Outputs.SetProperty("PortProductIdForParent",strPortProductIdForParent);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Parent Product Id", GetPropsetFieldByKey(psProd, "ProductId", strKeyName, strKeyValue));_newline// Outputs.SetProperty("Parent Product Name", GetPropsetFieldByKey(psProd, "PortProductName", strKeyName, strKeyValue));_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Prod Item Id", GetPropsetFieldByKey(psProd, "PortValidProdId", strKeyName, strKeyValue));//PortValidProdId_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Product Port Id", GetPropsetFieldByKey(psProd, "AssemblyPortId", strKeyName, strKeyValue));//AssemblyPortId_newline return CancelOperation;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: GetDetailsOfLooseProductInstance

Business_spcService_spcScript.Comments: 20110929:Enhanced to search by multiple property matches
Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function GetPropsetFieldByKey(psSRC,FieldName,KeyName,KeyValue)_newline{_newline/*_newlinethis is renamed from Get Asset FieldByKey to GetPropsetFieldByKey_newlinepsSRC will contain child propset records_newline20110929:Enhanced to search by multiple property matches, can take in : separated KeyName and KeyValue input arguments_newline*/_newline_newline var arrKeyName = KeyName.split(":");_newline var arrKeyValue = KeyValue.split(":");_newline _newline_newline var matchFound = true;_newline for (var iCnt=0; iCnt < psSRC.GetChildCount(); iCnt++)_newline {//for each child_newline matchFound = true;_newline for(var i=0; i < arrKeyName.length; i++)_newline {_newline if(arrKeyValue[i] != psSRC.GetChild(iCnt).GetProperty(arrKeyName[i]))_newline matchFound = false;_newline }_newline if(matchFound)_newline return psSRC.GetChild(iCnt).GetProperty(FieldName);_newline }_newline return "";_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: GetPropsetFieldByKey

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function LOV(Inputs,Outputs)_newline{_newlinevar BOListOfVal = TheApplication().GetBusObject("List Of Values");_newlinevar BCListOfVal = BOListOfVal.GetBusComp("List Of Values");_newlinevar strLIC = Inputs.GetProperty("Attrib01");_newlinevar strDisplayName = "";_newlineBCListOfVal .ClearToQuery(); _newlineBCListOfVal.SetViewMode(AllView);_newlinevar SearchSpec = " [Value] ='"+ strLIC +"'";_newlineBCListOfVal.SetSearchExpr(SearchSpec); _newlineBCListOfVal.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newlinevar isRecord = BCListOfVal.FirstRecord();_newlineif (isRecord)_newline{_newlinestrDisplayName = BCListOfVal.GetFieldValue("Name");_newline} _newlineOutputs.SetProperty("Attrib01",strDisplayName);_newlineBCListOfVal = null;_newlineBOListOfVal = null;_newlinereturn (CancelOperation);_newline_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: LOV

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: /*---------------------------------------------------------------------- _newlineGeneric function to log the propertyset to file _newline---------------+------+--------+---------------------------------------------- _newlineDate(YYYYMMDD) | Ver | By | Description of Change _newline---------------+------+--------+---------------------------------------------- _newline20050515 | 1.00 | Prasad | Creation _newline20051228 | 1.1 | Shyamal| Commenting the Log property set. _newline20051228 | 1.2 | Prasad | UnCommenting the filewriting, better way is to change BSUProp. _newline---------------+------+--------+---------------------------------------------- _newline*/ _newlinefunction LogPropSet(inputPS,msFileSuffix)_newline{ _newline//1.1 below _newline if(mbDebug) _newline { _newline msFileSuffix = NormFileName(msFileSuffix); _newline var msFileName = msGFileName + ((miFileSeq < 10)?"0":"") + miFileSeq + msFileSuffix + ".xml"; _newline var fileSvc = TheApplication().GetService("EAI XML Write to File"); _newline var outPS = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline var tmpProp = inputPS.Copy(); _newline tmpProp.SetProperty("FileName", strServerPath + msFileName); _newline fileSvc.InvokeMethod("WritePropSet", tmpProp, outPS); _newline//clean up _newline fileSvc = null; _newline outPS.Reset(); _newline tmpProp.Reset(); _newline miFileSeq++; _newline } _newline//1.1 above _newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: LogPropSet

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: /*---------------------------------------------------------------------- _newlineCan be used to remove special characters from the prospective file names. _newlineNot being used much currently. All special characters /\~ will be replaced by space char _newlineChange History _newline---------------+------+--------+---------------------------------------------- _newlineDate(YYYYMMDD) | Ver | By | Description of Change _newline---------------+------+--------+---------------------------------------------- _newline20060916 | 1.0 | Prasad | Creation _newline---------------+------+--------+----------------------------------------------*/ _newlinefunction NormFileName(strSrc) _newline{//define special string _newline var strSpStr = ":/\~"; _newline var chrToFind; _newline var chrToReplace = "_us"; _newline var chrFound; _newline var strDest =""; _newline for(var iCharCnt=0; iCharCnt < strSpStr.length; iCharCnt++) _newline { _newline strDest = ""; _newline chrToFind = strSpStr.substring(iCharCnt,iCharCnt+1); _newline for(var iStrCharPos=0; iStrCharPos<strSrc.length; iStrCharPos++) _newline { _newline chrFound = strSrc.substring(iStrCharPos,iStrCharPos+1); _newline if(chrFound == chrToFind ) _newline strDest = strDest + chrToReplace; _newline else _newline strDest = strDest + chrFound; _newline } _newline strSrc = strDest; _newline } _newline return strDest; _newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: NormFileName

if("LoadBRMBatch"==MethodName)_newline// return func_usLoadBRMBatch(Inputs,Outputs);_newline else if("ProcessPrepaidOrder"==MethodName)_newline return func_usProcessPrepaidOrder(Inputs, Outputs);_newline else if("CreateModifyOrder"==MethodName)_newline return func_usCreateModifyOrder(Inputs, Outputs);_newline else if("CreateModifyOrder_usPostpaid"==MethodName)_newline return Outputs);_newline return CancelOperation;_newline }_newline else if("Blacklist"==MethodName)_newline {_newline return func_usBlacklist(Inputs, Outputs);_newline }_newline else if("Disconnect"==MethodName)_newline {_newline return func_usDisconnect(Inputs, Outputs);_newline }_newline else if("CreateActivity"==MethodName)_newline {_newline return func_usCreateActivity(Inputs, Outputs);_newline }_newline else if("mCheckBlackBerryService"==MethodName)_newline {_newline return mCheckBlackBerryService(inRootId , Outputs );_newline }_newline else if("LoadRecordsfromFile"==MethodName)_newline return func_usLoadRecordsfromFile(Inputs, Outputs);_newline else if("ProcessFiles"==MethodName)_newline return func_usProcessFiles(Inputs, Outputs);_newline else_newline if("Process_usALU_usCL_usEDR"==MethodName)_newline{_newline mProcess_usALU_usCL_usEDR(Inputs, Outputs);_newline return (CancelOperation);_newline} _newlineelse_newline if("GetCustInfo"==MethodName)_newline{_newline mGetCustInfo (Inputs , Outputs);_newline return (CancelOperation);_newline}_newlineelse if("GetAssetForMSISDN_usTest"==MethodName)_newline return func_usGetAssetForMSISDN_usTest(Inputs, Outputs);_newlineelse if("GetAssetForMSISDN"==MethodName)_newline return func_usGetAssetForMSISDN(Inputs, Outputs);_newline else if("GetDetailsOfLooseProductInstance"==MethodName)_newline return GetDetailsOfLooseProductInstance(Inputs, Outputs);_newline// else if("ProcessSuspendResume"==MethodName)_newline// return func_usProcessSuspendResume(Inputs, Outputs);_newline// else if("SubmitSuspendResumeSR"==MethodName)_newline// return func_usSubmitSuspendResumeSR(Inputs, Outputs);_newline else if("ProcessBarringEDR"==MethodName)_newline return func_usBarringEDR(Inputs, Outputs);_newline else if("ValidateSuspendResume"==MethodName)_newline return func_usValidateSuspendResume(Inputs, Outputs);_newline else if("UpdateOLI" == MethodName)_newline return func_usUpdateOLI(Inputs, Outputs);_newlineelse if("LOV" == MethodName)_newline return LOV(Inputs, Outputs);_newline else if("AutomatedProcessing" == MethodName)_newline return func_usAutomatedProcessing(Inputs, Outputs);_newline else if("DisconnectOrder"==MethodName)_newline return func_usDisconnectOrder(Inputs, Outputs)_newline else if("CancelFDO"==MethodName)_newline return func_usCancelFDO(Inputs, Outputs)_newline else if("CreateModifyOrderGeneric"==MethodName)_newline return func_usCreateModifyOrderGeneric(Inputs, Outputs)_newline else_newline return (ContinueOperation);_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: Service_usPreInvokeMethod

Business_spcService_spcScript.Comments: [SUBHAJITG][Added code to process UNBAR EDRS for postpaid]
Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function func_usSetActionCodeUnbar(strMSISDN)_newline{ _newline//sets action code add/delete_newline var boAsset = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Asset DB"); _newline var assetBc = boAsset.GetBusComp("Asset Mgmt - Asset");_newline prodName_usUnbar = "";_newline actionCode_usUnbar = "";_newline var ICbar = "Collection IC Bar";_newline var OGBar = "Collection OG Bar";_newline var active = "Active";_newline var srchexp;_newline //var strMSISDN = Inputs.GetProperty("MSISDN");_newline with(assetBc)_newline {_newline SetViewMode(AllView); _newline ActivateField("Serial Number"); _newline ActivateField("Auto Type"); _newline ActivateField("Status"); _newline ClearToQuery(); _newline srchexp = "[Serial Number] ='" + strMSISDN + "' AND ([Auto Type] = '" + OGBar + "' OR [Auto Type] = '" + ICbar + "') AND [Status] = '" + active + "'";_newline //TheApplication().RaiseErrorText(srchexp);_newline //SetSearchExpr("[Serial Number] ='" + strMSISDN + "' AND([Auto Type] = '" + OGBar + "' OR [Auto Type] = '" + ICbar +"') AND ");_newline SetSearchExpr(srchexp);_newline ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline countBarring = CountRecords();_newline if( countBarring ==2)_newline {_newline actionCode_usUnbar = "Delete";_newline prodName_usUnbar = "Collection IC Bar";_newline }_newline if ( countBarring != 2)_newline {_newline var isRec = FirstRecord();_newline if(isRec)_newline {_newline actionCode_usUnbar = "Delete";_newline prodName_usUnbar = GetFieldValue("Product Name");_newline }// if(isRec)_newline }// if (c != 2)_newline }// with(assetBc)_newline boAsset =null;_newline assetBc = null;_newline return ContinueOperation;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: SetActionCodeUnbar

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function TestBC(Inputs,Outputs)_newline{_newline var strBOName = Inputs.GetProperty("BOName");_newline var strBCName = Inputs.GetProperty("BCName");_newline var strFldName = Inputs.GetProperty("FieldName");_newline var strSS = Inputs.GetProperty("SearchSpec");_newline var boTest:BusObject = TheApplication().GetBusObject(strBOName);_newline var bcTest:BusComp = boTest.GetBusComp(strBCName);_newline bcTest.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcTest.ActivateField("Id");_newline bcTest.ActivateField(strFldName);_newline bcTest.ClearToQuery();_newline bcTest.SetSearchExpr(strSS);_newline bcTest.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcTest.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline Outputs.SetProperty("FieldValue",bcTest.GetFieldValue(strFldName));_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code","NO_usREC");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message","No record was found with gven search specification.");_newline }_newline bcTest = null;_newline boTest = null;_newline return CancelOperation;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: TestBC

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function TestOrder(Inputs,Outputs)_newline{_newline var boTest:BusObject = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Order Entry (Sales)");_newline var bcTest:BusComp = boTest.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Orders");_newline var bcOLI:BusComp = boTest.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Line Items");_newline bcTest.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcTest.ActivateField("Id");_newline bcTest.ClearToQuery();_newline bcTest.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + Inputs.GetProperty("Order Id") + "'");_newline bcTest.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcTest.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Product");_newline bcOLI.NewRecord(NewAfter);_newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Action Code","Add");_newline var bcProdPick:BusComp = bcOLI.GetPicklistBusComp("Product");//Product_newline//should be Product w/ ST constraint instead? but get error: Field 'Cfg Complex Product Id' does not exist in definition for business component 'Order Entry - Line Items'_newline bcProdPick.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcProdPick.ClearToQuery();_newline bcProdPick.SetSearchExpr("[Name]='" + Inputs.GetProperty("Product Name") + "'");_newline bcProdPick.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcProdPick.FirstRecord())_newline bcProdPick.Pick();_newline bcProdPick=null;_newline bcOLI.WriteRecord();_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code","NO_usREC");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message","No record was found with gven search specification.");_newline }_newline bcTest = null;_newline boTest = null;_newline return CancelOperation;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: TestOrder

Business_spcService_spcScript.Comments: 20140528:NS Added function for AutoAsset
Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: /*-------------+------+--------+---------------------------------------------- _newlineDate(YYYYMMDD) | Ver | By | Description of Change _newline---------------+------+--------+---------------------------------------------- _newline20140527 | 1.00 | NANDEESHS | This function will Complete order & auto Asset_newline---------------+------+--------+--------------------------------------------*/ _newlinefunction func_usAutoAsset(Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newlinevar strOrderId = Inputs.GetProperty("RowId");_newline var boorder = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Order Entry (Sales)");_newline var bcorder = boorder.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Orders");_newline var bcorderLine = boorder.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Line Items");_newline var err ="";_newline bcorder.ClearToQuery();_newline bcorder.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcorder.SetSearchSpec("Id",strOrderId);_newline bcorder.ExecuteQuery();_newline var isRecord = bcorder.FirstRecord();_newline while(isRecord)_newline {_newline try_newline {_newline with(bcorderLine)_newline {_newline ClearToQuery();_newline SetViewMode(AllView);_newline ExecuteQuery();_newline var isLineRecord = FirstRecord();_newline while(isLineRecord)_newline {_newline SetFieldValue("Status","Complete");_newline WriteRecord();_newline InvokeMethod("OrderToAsset");_newline isLineRecord = NextRecord();_newline }_newline }_newline bcorder.SetFieldValue("Status","Complete");_newline isRecord = bcorder.NextRecord();_newline }_newline catch(e)_newline {_newline err=e.toString(); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Err",err); _newline }_newline } _newline bcorder = null;_newline boorder = null;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usAutoAsset

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: /*-------+------+--------+---------------------------------------------- _newlineYYYYMMDD | Ver | By | Description of Change _newline---------+------+--------+---------------------------------------------- _newline20140206 | 1.00 | PPB | Barring related EDR processing _newline20140213 | 1.10 | PPB | PortOut driven bestmate cleanup order _newline20140224 | 1.20 | PPB | Date check for AutoResume _newline20140318 | 1.30 | ARPANC | If Donot Block flag is true on an account don't bar it _newline---------+------+--------+--------------------------------------------*/ _newlinefunction func_usAutomatedProcessing(Inputs, Outputs) _newline{ _newline var strEDRBatchId = Inputs.GetProperty("EDRBatchId"); _newline var strEDRChildId = Inputs.GetProperty("EDRChildId"); _newline var strExtRefId = Inputs.GetProperty("Ext Ref Id");//stamp on the resultant record like order/SR etc _newline var strRecordType = Inputs.GetProperty("RecordType");//will contain batchtype at parent record _newline var strActionType = Inputs.GetProperty("Attrib02");//will contain actiontype at child record _newline var strAttrib01 = Inputs.GetProperty("Attrib01"); _newline var strAttrib03 = Inputs.GetProperty("Attrib03"); _newline var strAttrib04 = Inputs.GetProperty("Attrib04"); _newline var strAttrib05 = Inputs.GetProperty("Attrib05"); _newline var strAttrib11 = Inputs.GetProperty("Attrib11"); _newline var strAttrib12 = Inputs.GetProperty("Attrib12"); _newline var strAttrib13 = Inputs.GetProperty("Attrib13"); _newline var strAttrib21 = Inputs.GetProperty("Attrib21"); _newline var strAttrib22 = Inputs.GetProperty("Attrib22"); _newline var strAttrib23 = Inputs.GetProperty("Attrib23"); _newline var strErrCode="OK", strErrMesg="",strOrderId=""; _newline var dtReq,dtNow=new Date(); _newline _newline if("RemoveBestMateNP"==strActionType) _newline { _newline func_usProcessEDR_usBestMateCleanup(Inputs, Outputs); _newline strErrMesg = Outputs.GetProperty("Error Message"); _newline strErrCode = Outputs.GetProperty("Error Code"); _newline } _newline else if("AutoResume"==strActionType) _newline {//Attrib04 - stores assetintegid _newline//1.2 below _newline if(""!=strAttrib12) _newline dtReq=new Date(strAttrib12); _newline else _newline dtReq=new Date(); _newline if(dtReq >= dtNow)//wait till maturity _newline { _newline strErrMesg = "AutoResume order not yet ready to be created based on timestamp of request."; _newline strErrCode = "Initial"; _newline } _newline else _newline { _newline//1.2 above _newline func_usValidateExistingOrder(Inputs, Outputs) _newline strErrMesg = Outputs.GetProperty("Error Message"); _newline strErrCode = Outputs.GetProperty("Error Code"); _newline strOrderId = Outputs.GetProperty("Order Id"); _newline if("OK"==strErrCode) _newline { _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Integration Id", strAttrib04); _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Request Type", "Resume"); _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Request Source", "User");//hard code for EDRs _newline func_usProcessSuspendResumeSub(Inputs, Outputs); _newline strOrderId = Outputs.GetProperty("OrderId"); _newline strErrMesg = Outputs.GetProperty("Error Message"); _newline strErrCode = Outputs.GetProperty("Error Code"); _newline } _newline } _newline } _newline else if("Credit:Account Termination"==strActionType || _newline "Credit:Incoming Bar" ==strActionType || _newline "Credit:Outgoing Bar" ==strActionType || "Credit:Exit Collection" ==strActionType || "Credit:Promise To Pay" ==strActionType) _newline { _newline // 1.3 Below _newline var boAccount = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Account"); _newline var bcAccount = boAccount.GetBusComp("Account");//child assets _newline bcAccount.ActivateField("VFQA Do Not Block"); _newline bcAccount.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline bcAccount.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcAccount.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strAttrib03 + "'"); _newline bcAccount.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newlineif(bcAccount.FirstRecord()) _newline { _newline var strDonotBlock = bcAccount.GetFieldValue("VFQA Do Not Block"); _newline if (strDonotBlock == "Y") _newline { _newline strErrCode="Initial"; _newline strErrMesg="Account Do Not Block Flag is True"; _newline } _newline else _newline { _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Bill Profile Id",strAttrib01); _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Request Type", strActionType); _newline func_usProcessCollectionsForBillProfile(Inputs, Outputs); _newline strErrCode = Outputs.GetProperty("Error Code"); _newline strErrMesg = Outputs.GetProperty("Error Message"); _newline } _newline } _newline } _newline // 1.3 Above _newline else _newline { _newline strErrCode="UNSUPPORTED"; _newline strErrMesg="Unsupported automated processing request for type: " + strActionType; _newline } _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code",strErrCode); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message",strErrMesg); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Order Id",strOrderId); _newline bcAccount = null; _newline boAccount = null; _newline return CancelOperation; _newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usAutomatedProcessing

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function func_usBarringEDR(Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newline var strOrdSubType = Inputs.GetProperty("RecordType");_newline var strMSISDN = Inputs.GetProperty("MSISDN");//can be FL number also :-)_newline var strProductName = Inputs.GetProperty("Product Name"); _newline var strProductId="", strAccntId="";_newline var strActionCode = Inputs.GetProperty("Action Code"); _newline var strToBeOrdIntId= Inputs.GetProperty("Ext Ref Id");_newline var boMain, bcOrd, bcOLI, bcProd, bcAsset, bcAccnt, bsUtil, psIp, psOp;_newline var strErrCode = "OK", strErrMesg ="";_newline var strOrderId,strAccId, strRootAssetId, strRootAccId, strCpdProdNum, strIntegId, strRootIntegId, strBillingType, strServiceInst, strProductType, strParBillingType, strParServiceInst;_newline var strOpStatus,strStatus,strOLIProdName, strConId, strCIPId, isRec;_newline//check existing order_newline func_usValidateExistingOrder(Inputs, Outputs);_newline strOrderId = Outputs.GetProperty("Order Id");_newline strErrCode = Outputs.GetProperty("Error Code");_newline strErrMesg = Outputs.GetProperty("Error Message");_newline if("OK" == strErrCode)_newline {_newline if(("" == strProductName && ("Add" == strActionCode || "Delete" == strActionCode)) _newline || "" == strActionCode _newline || "" == strMSISDN _newline || "" == strToBeOrdIntId_newline || "CollectionsBarring" != strOrdSubType)_newline {_newline strErrCode = "NOT_usENOUGH_usINPUTS";_newline strErrMesg = "Ext Ref Id, MSISDN, Action Code are mandatory inputs, for Add or Delete action Product Name/Code must be provided as input.";_newline }_newline else _newline {_newline if("Add" == strActionCode || "Delete" == strActionCode)_newline {_newline//check product_newline boMain = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Internal Product");_newline bcProd = boMain.GetBusComp("Internal Product");_newline bcProd.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcProd.ActivateField("Name");_newline bcProd.ClearToQuery();_newline bcProd.SetSearchExpr("[Name]='" + strProductName + "' OR [Part #]='" + strProductName + "'");_newline bcProd.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(!bcProd.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline strErrCode = "INVALID_usPRODUCT";_newline strErrMesg = "Product with Name/code = " + strProductName + " not found.";_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strProductName = bcProd.GetFieldValue("Name");_newline strProductId = bcProd.GetFieldValue("Id");_newline }_newline }_newline if("OK" == strErrCode)_newline {_newline boMain = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Asset Management");_newline bcAsset = boMain.GetBusComp("Asset Mgmt - Asset");_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Integration Id");_newline bcAsset.ClearToQuery();_newline//we consider non-Inactive, non-promotion root assets _newline bcAsset.SetSearchExpr("[Serial Number]='" + strMSISDN + "' AND [Status]<>'Inactive' AND [Parent Asset Id] IS NULL AND [Product Type]<>'Promotion'");_newline bcAsset.ExecuteQuery();_newline if(!bcAsset.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline strErrCode = "ASSET_usNOT_usFOUND";_newline strErrMesg = "Asset with service id " + strMSISDN + " not found.";_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strIntegId = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Integration Id");_newline if("Resume" == strActionCode || "Suspend" == strActionCode)_newline {//prepare and proceed to create respective order_newline Inputs.SetProperty("Integration Id", strIntegId);_newline Inputs.SetProperty("Request Type", strActionCode);_newline Inputs.SetProperty("Request Source", "System");//hard code for EDRs_newline func_usProcessSuspendResumeSub(Inputs, Outputs);_newline strOrderId = Outputs.GetProperty("OrderId");_newline strErrMesg = Outputs.GetProperty("Error Message");_newline strErrCode = Outputs.GetProperty("Error Code");_newline }_newline else_newline {//this is barring products request Add or Delete (one or more at a time?)_newline strErrCode = "WIP";_newline strErrMesg = "This functionality is being implemented and is in WIP status.";_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline//check asset details_newline }_newline }_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Order Id", strOrderId);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", strErrMesg);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", strErrCode);_newline return CancelOperation;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usBarringEDR

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: /*-------------+------+--------+---------------------------------------------- _newlineDate(YYYYMMDD) | Ver | By | Description of Change _newline---------------+------+--------+---------------------------------------------- _newline20140129 | 1.00 | Prasad | This function cancels all the future dated orders for a given asset _newline---------------+------+--------+--------------------------------------------*/ _newlinefunction func_usCancelFDO(Inputs, Outputs) _newline{ _newline//this function fires cancel action on all future dated orders for a given asset. _newline//it is assumed that FDOs will typically contain only one service bundle / root OLI for the given asset instance _newline var strErrCode="OK",strErrMesg=""; _newline var strAssetIntegId = Inputs.GetProperty("Integration Id");//rowid:1-UITVX, integid:1-UIS3O _newline var boMain,bcOLI,bcOrder,psIp,psOp; _newline var bsUtil; _newline var isRec; _newline var sysdate = new Date();_newline _newline var CurMonth = sysdate.getMonth();_newline _newline var CurDay = sysdate.getDate();_newline _newline var vTimeString = (sysdate.getMonth() + "/" + sysdate.getDate() + "/" + sysdate.getFullYear()+ " 00:00:00");_newline_newline var dtNow=new Date(); _newline dtNow.setHours(0);dtNow.setMinutes(0);dtNow.setSeconds(0); _newline var recCnt=0; _newline var recCntErr=0; _newline var dtDue; _newline var strOrderIdList=""; _newline var arrOrderId; _newline if(""==strAssetIntegId) _newline { _newline strErrCode="ASSET_usINTEG_usID_usMISSING"; _newline strErrMesg="Asset reference needs to be specified as input 'Integration Id'"; _newline } _newline else _newline { _newline boMain=TheApplication().GetBusObject("PDS Order Item"); _newline bcOLI=boMain.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Line Items"); _newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Order Header Id"); _newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Due Date"); _newline bcOLI.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline bcOLI.InvokeMethod("SetAdminMode", "TRUE");_newline_newline_newline bcOLI.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcOLI.SetSearchExpr("[Asset Integration Id]='" + strAssetIntegId + "' AND [Status]='Open'" ); _newline bcOLI.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline isRec=bcOLI.FirstRecord(); _newline while(isRec) _newline { _newline dtDue=new Date(bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Due Date")); _newline dtDue.setHours(0);dtDue.setMinutes(0);dtDue.setSeconds(0); _newline if(dtDue>dtNow) _newline strOrderIdList=strOrderIdList + bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Order Header Id") + ";"; _newline isRec=bcOLI.NextRecord(); _newline } _newline//so far the list of order Ids is received, now run in a loop and execute cancelorder _newline arrOrderId=strOrderIdList.split(";"); _newline if(0<arrOrderId.length && ""!=arrOrderId[0])//an array out of null string also has one element :-( _newline { _newline bsUtil=TheApplication().GetService("Workflow Process Manager"); _newline/*OOB Cancel order processing is through a signal 'OrderCancel' _newlineIt invokes WFP 'SWICancel Sales Order' which is interactive flow _newlineIt validation order by Rule Set 'Cancel Order Validation' - checks [Cancel Reason] is not null and [Change Cost] is null (i.e. PONR not reached) _newlineIf valid set field values before submitting order for cancellation _newline--Order BC _newlineCancel Reason = System Cancelled FDO _newlineFulfillment Mode = LookupValue("FULFLMNT_usMODE_usTYPE", "Cancel") _newlineStatus = LookupValue("FS_usORDER_usSTATUS", "Pending Cancel") _newlineFulfillment Status Code = "" _newlineBack Office Error Text = "" _newline--OLI BC _newlineFulfillment Status Code = "" _newlineStatus Context = "" _newlineThen invoke SISOMBillingSubmitOrderWebService, set input arguments _newlineObject Id=Order Row id _newlineFulfillment Mode = Cancel*/ _newline boMain=TheApplication().GetBusObject("Order Entry (Sales)"); _newline bcOrder=boMain.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Orders"); _newline bcOrder.SetViewMode(AllView) ;_newline bcOrder.InvokeMethod("SetAdminMode", "TRUE");_newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Cancel Reason"); _newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Fulfillment Mode"); _newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Status"); _newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Fulfillment Status Code"); _newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Back Office Error Text"); _newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Requested Ship Date"); // [MAYANK][For Setting Due Date = Sysdate in case of Cancel Order Defect# 8606]_newline_newline_newline _newline bcOLI=boMain.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Line Items"); _newline bcOLI.SetViewMode(AllView) _newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Fulfillment Status Code"); _newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Status Context"); _newline for(var i=0;i<arrOrderId.length;i++) _newline { _newline if(""!=arrOrderId[i]) _newline { _newline bcOrder.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcOrder.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + arrOrderId[i] + "'"); _newline bcOrder.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline if(bcOrder.FirstRecord()) _newline { _newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Cancel Reason","System Cancelled FDO"); _newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Fulfillment Mode", "Cancel"); _newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Status","Pending Cancel"); _newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Fulfillment Status Code",""); _newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Back Office Error Text",""); _newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Requested Ship Date",vTimeString); // [MAYANK][For Setting Due Date = Sysdate in case of Cancel Order Defect# 8606]_newline bcOrder.WriteRecord(); _newline isRec = bcOLI.FirstRecord();//no need to query again since bcOLI has been already opened _newline while(isRec) _newline { _newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Fulfillment Status Code",""); _newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Status Context",""); _newline bcOLI.WriteRecord(); _newline isRec=bcOLI.NextRecord(); _newline } _newline psIp=TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline psIp.SetProperty("ProcessName", "SISOMBillingSubmitOrderWebService"); _newline psIp.SetProperty("Fulfillment Mode", "Cancel"); _newline psIp.SetProperty("RowId", arrOrderId[i]); _newline psOp=TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline try _newline { _newline bsUtil.InvokeMethod("RunProcess", psIp, psOp);//do not check any errors etc, since this async submission _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Order_us" + arrOrderId[i],"OK"); _newline recCnt++; _newline } _newline catch(e) _newline { _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Order_us" + arrOrderId[i], e.errCode + ":" + e.errText); _newline recCntErr++; _newline } _newline } _newline } _newline } _newline strErrMesg="Future dated orders cancellation: Cancel request submitted - " + recCnt + ", failed - " + recCntErr; _newline } _newline else _newline { _newline strErrMesg="No future dated orders found."; _newline } _newline } _newline arrOrderId=null; _newline boMain=null; _newline bcOLI=null; _newline bcOrder=null; _newline psOp=null; _newline psIp=null; _newline bsUtil=null; _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", strErrCode); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", strErrMesg); _newline return CancelOperation; _newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usCancelFDO

Business_spcService_spcScript.Comments: [ARPANCHOUHAN][20.02.2014][ADDED CODE FOR EXIT COLLECTIONS RESUME/MODIFY ORDER]
Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: /*-------------+------+--------+---------------------------------------------- _newlineDate(YYYYMMDD) | Ver | By | Description of Change _newline---------------+------+--------+---------------------------------------------- _newline20140222 | 1.00 | ARPANC | This function will remove System Bar from an asset _newline---------------+------+--------+--------------------------------------------*/ _newlinefunction func_usCheckandRemoveBar(Inputs, Outputs) _newline{ _newline var isRec; _newline var isPresent; _newline var strChildInfo; _newline var strOrderId = ""; _newline var strOrderValid = "Y" _newline var strAssetId = Inputs.GetProperty("Asset Id"); _newline var strAssetIntegId = Inputs.GetProperty("Integration Id"); _newline var strExtRefIdChld = Inputs.GetProperty("Ext Ref Id"); _newline var strAccntId = Inputs.GetProperty("Account Id"); _newline var strContactId = Inputs.GetProperty("Contact Id"); _newline var strCIPId = Inputs.GetProperty("Billing Profile Id"); _newline var strNotAssertise = Inputs.GetProperty("NotAssertise");//NandeeshS added to get Request type_newline var strProdName = "Dummy" _newline var strActionCode = "Dummy" _newline var strParentProdName1 = Inputs.GetProperty("Parent Product Names"); _newline var strParentProdName = "Dummy"; _newline _newline var boAssetChild = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Account"); _newline var bcAssetChild = boAssetChild.GetBusComp("Asset Mgmt - Asset (Order Mgmt)"); _newline bcAssetChild.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline bcAssetChild.ActivateField("Product Name"); _newline bcAssetChild.ClearToQuery(); _newline//1.1 Below:Query Asset with Parent Asset Id and Product Type _newline bcAssetChild.SetSearchExpr("[Root Asset Id]='" + strAssetId + "' AND [Prod Type] = 'System Bar'"); _newline bcAssetChild.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline isRec = bcAssetChild.FirstRecord(); _newline while(isRec) _newline { _newline//1.1 Below:Fetch ProductName for all the asset returned in above query and prepare a consolidated input to create and update order _newline strProdName = bcAssetChild.GetFieldValue("Product Name")+";"+strProdName; _newline strActionCode = "Delete"+";"+strActionCode; _newline strParentProdName = strParentProdName1+";"+strParentProdName; _newline isRec = bcAssetChild.NextRecord(); _newline } _newline//1.1 Below:Format Input for Function func_usCreateModifyOrderGeneric. _newline strProdName = strProdName.split(";Dummy"); _newline strProdName = strProdName[0]; _newline strActionCode = strActionCode.split(";Dummy"); _newline strActionCode = strActionCode[0]; _newline strParentProdName = strParentProdName.split(";Dummy"); _newline strParentProdName = strParentProdName[0]; _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Ext Ref Id", strExtRefIdChld); _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Integration Id", strAssetIntegId); _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Account Id", strAccntId); separated lists _newline var strListOfAction = Inputs.GetProperty("Action Codes"); _newline var strListOfParProd = Inputs.GetProperty("Parent Product Names"); _newline var stByPassValidation = Inputs.GetProperty("ByPass Validation");_newline var arrListOfProd = strListOfProd.split(";"); _newline var arrListOfAction = strListOfAction.split(";"); _newline var arrListOfParProd = strListOfParProd.split(";"); _newline//fetch and store the values tobe set on Add product OLIs _newline var arrListOfProdItemId = new Array(); _newline var strAssetNumber;_newline _newline//input validations and preperations _newline_newline// Outputs.SetProperty("arrListOfProd",arrListOfProd);_newline //Outputs.SetProperty("arrListOfAction",arrListOfAction+" actual "+strListOfAction);_newline// Outputs.SetProperty("strListOfParProd",strListOfParProd[0]); _newline_newline_newline if(""==strDoSubmit) _newline strDoSubmit="Y";//consider autosubmission when not speciffied _newline if(""==strAssetIntegId) _newline { _newline strErrCode="INPUT_usERROR"; _newline strErrMesg=strErrMesg + "Non null value required for 'Asset Integration Id' on which modify order is to be created.\r"; _newline } _newline if(arrListOfProd.length != arrListOfParProd.length || arrListOfProd.length != arrListOfAction.length) _newline {//length of all arrays must be same _newline strErrCode="INPUT_usERROR"; _newline strErrMesg=strErrMesg + "Count of values in the three inputs 'Product Names', 'Action Codes', 'Parent Product Names' must be same.\r"; _newline } _newline if(""==arrListOfProd[0] || ""==arrListOfAction[0]) _newline {//First element must not be 0, blank string split gives a one-element array :-( _newline strErrCode="INPUT_usERROR"; _newline strErrMesg=strErrMesg + "There must be at least one non-null value provided for 'Product Names' and 'Action Codes'.\r"; _newline } _newline for(var i=0; i < arrListOfAction.length; i++) _newline { _newline if("Delete"!=arrListOfAction[i] && "Add"!=arrListOfAction[i] && arrListOfAction[i] != "" && arrListOfAction[i] != null ) _newline { _newline strErrCode="INPUT_usERROR"; _newline arrListOfProductPortId[i]=""; _newline arrListOfProdFeasib[i]=""; _newline } _newline//check asset, must not be inactive (can be in suspended status), must be a root asset _newline boAsset = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Asset Management"); _newline bcAsset.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline isRec=bcAsset.FirstRecord(); _newline if(!isRec) _newline { _newline strErrCode="INPUT_usERROR"; _newline strErrMesg=strErrMesg + "Asset with integration id " + strAssetIntegId + " not found.\r"; _newline strErrMesg=strErrMesg + "Asset is not a root asset.\r"; _newline } _newline if("Inactive"==strParAssetId) _newline { _newline strErrCode="INPUT_usERROR"; _newline strErrMesg=strErrMesg + "Asset status = " + strRootAssetStatus + ", hence can not create modify order.\r"; _newline } _newline//get details about requested add/delete operations _newline if("OK"==strErrCode) _newline { _newline for(var i=0; i < arrListOfProd.length; i++) _newline { _newline if("Add"==arrListOfAction[i]) _newline {//product to Add must exist in the root product bundle _newline var psIp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline var psOp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline psIp.SetProperty("Root Product Name", strRootProdName); _newline psIp.SetProperty("Child Product Name", arrListOfProd[i]); _newline if("" != arrListOfParProd[i]) _newline psIp.SetProperty("Parent Product Name", arrListOfParProd[i]); _newline GetDetailsOfLooseProductInstance(psIp,psOp); _newline arrListOfParProd[i] = psOp.GetProperty("Parent Product Id");//this can be root product itself _newline arrListOfProdItemId[i] = psOp.GetProperty("Prod Item Id");//PortValidProdId _newline arrListOfProductPortId[i] = psOp.GetProperty("Product Port Id");//AssemblyPortId _newline// Outputs.SetProperty("info_usprod_us" + i, "Parent:" + arrListOfParProd[i] + ";PortValidProdId:" + arrListOfProdItemId[i] + ";AssemblyPortId:" + arrListOfProductPortId[i]); _newline if(""==arrListOfProdItemId[i]) _newline { _newline strErrCode="PRODUCT_usERROR"; _newline strErrMesgLocal = "Product [" + arrListOfProd[i] + "] to add, not a valid child in hierarchy."; _newline strErrMesg=strErrMesg + strErrMesgLocal + "\r"; _newline arrListOfProdFeasib[i]=arrListOfProdFeasib[i] + "\r" + strErrMesgLocal; _newline } _newline//Check add-product does not exist already in asset [multi-cardinality option??] _newline bcAsset.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcAsset.SetSearchExpr("[Root Asset Id]='" + strRootAssetId + "' AND [Status]<>'Inactive' AND [Product Name]='" + arrListOfProd[i] + "'"); _newline bcAsset.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline isRec=bcAsset.FirstRecord(); _newline if(isRec) _newline { _newline strErrCode="PRODUCT_usERROR"; _newline strErrMesgLocal = "Product [" + arrListOfProd[i] + "] to add, already exists in asset structure."; _newline strErrMesg=strErrMesg + strErrMesgLocal + "\r"; _newline arrListOfProdFeasib[i]=arrListOfProdFeasib[i] + "\r" + strErrMesgLocal; _newline } _newline } _newline else if("Delete"==arrListOfAction[i]) _newline {//must exist in asset check one by one and set error _newline bcAsset.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcAsset.SetSearchExpr("[Root Asset Id]='" + strRootAssetId + "' AND [Status]<>'Inactive' AND [Product Name]='" + arrListOfProd[i] + "'"); _newline bcAsset.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline isRec=bcAsset.FirstRecord(); _newline if(!isRec) _newline { _newline strErrCode="PRODUCT_usERROR"; _newline strErrMesgLocal = "Product [" + arrListOfProd[i] + "] to delete, not in asset structure."; _newline strErrMesg=strErrMesg + strErrMesgLocal + "\r"; _newline arrListOfProdFeasib[i]=arrListOfProdFeasib[i] + "\r" + strErrMesgLocal; _newline } _newline } _newline } _newline } _newline for(i=0; i<arrListOfProd.length; i++) _newline Outputs.SetProperty("prod_usfeasibility_us" + i, arrListOfProdFeasib[i]); _newline//now process order _newline if("OK"==strErrCode) _newline { _newline//create order _newline psIp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline psOp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline psIp.SetProperty("AssetIntegrationId", strAssetIntegId); _newline psIp.SetProperty("AccountId",strAccntId); _newline psIp.SetProperty("ProcessName", "SISOMModifyWebService-Order"); _newline bsUtil.InvokeMethod("RunProcess", psIp, psOp); _newline strOrderId=psOp.GetProperty("ActiveDocumentId"); _newline if(""!=strOrderId) _newline { _newline boOrder=TheApplication().GetBusObject("Order Entry (Sales)"); _newline bcOrder=boOrder.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Orders"); _newline bcOrder.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Back Office Order Number"); _newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Billing Profile Id"); _newline //bcOrder.ActivateField("Charged Flag"); //Commented by AMITB for Paid Flag removal_newline bcOrder.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcOrder.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strOrderId + "'"); _newline bcOrder.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline if(bcOrder.FirstRecord()) _newline { _newline if(""!=strExtRefId) _newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Back Office Order Number",strExtRefId); _newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Contact Id",strContactId); _newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Billing Profile Id",strCIPId);//Charged Flag=Y for submit _newline //bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Charged Flag","Y");//Commented by AMITB for Paid Flag removal_newline bcOrder.WriteRecord(); _newline//work on OLI _newline bcOLI=boOrder.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Line Items"); _newline bcOLI.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Product"); _newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Action Code"); _newline//get rowid of the root OLI for the asset integid specified, to be returned in the output _newline bcOLI.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcOLI.SetSearchExpr("[Asset Integration Id]='" + strAssetIntegId + "'"); _newline bcOLI.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline isRec=bcOLI.FirstRecord(); _newline if(isRec) _newline strRootOLIIdInNewOrder=bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Id"); _newline//delete first _newline for(var i=0; i < arrListOfProd.length; i++) _newline { _newline if(""==arrListOfProdFeasib[i] && "Delete"==arrListOfAction[i]) _newline { _newline bcOLI.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcOLI.SetSearchExpr("[Root Asset Integration Id]='" + strAssetIntegId + "' AND [Product]='" + arrListOfProd[i] + "'"); _newline bcOLI.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline isRec=bcOLI.FirstRecord(); _newline// ARPANC : Fixed issue with infinite loop _newline while(isRec) _newline { _newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Action Code","Delete"); _newline bcOLI.WriteRecord(); _newline isRec=bcOLI.NextRecord(); _newline } _newline } _newline } _newline//add next _newline for(var i=0; i < arrListOfProd.length; i++) _newline { _newline if(""==arrListOfProdFeasib[i] && "Add"==arrListOfAction[i]) _newline { _newline bcOLI.NewRecord(NewAfter); _newline bcPick = bcOLI.GetPicklistBusComp("Product"); _newline bcPick.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline bcPick.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcPick.SetSearchExpr("[Name]='" + arrListOfProd[i] + "'"); _newline bcPick.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline if(bcPick.FirstRecord()) _newline { _newline bcPick.Pick(); _newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Action Code","Add"); _newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Service Id", strAssetNumber); _newline bcOLI.WriteRecord(); _newline strTBDOLIId=bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Id"); _newline if("OK" != func_usPositionNewLineItemInOLITree(strOrderId,strTBDOLIId,arrListOfParProd[i],arrListOfProdItemId[i],arrListOfProductPortId[i])) _newline { _newline strErrCode="ERR"; _newline strErrMesg=strErrMesg+"Product " + arrListOfProd[i] + " could not be set in the asset hierarchy.\r"; _newline } _newline } _newline else _newline { _newline strErrCode="ERR"; _newline strErrMesg=strErrMesg + "Product " + strProductName + " could not be set on new OLI.\r"; _newline bcOLI.UndoRecord(); _newline } _newline } _newline } _newline//now submit if specified in inputs _newline if("Y"==strDoSubmit) _newline { _newline //bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Charged Flag","Y"); //Commented by AMITB for Paid Flag removal_newline psIp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline psOp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline psIp.SetProperty("RowId", strOrderId); _newline psIp.SetProperty("Fulfillment Mode","Deliver"); _newline psIp.SetProperty("CancelOrderFlg", strOrderValid);_newline psIp.SetProperty("SetPrimaryMSISDN", strPrimaryMSN);_newline if(stByPassValidation=="Y")_newline psIp.SetProperty("VFQAByPassValidationFlag", stByPassValidation);_newline psIp.SetProperty("ProcessName", "SISOMBillingSubmitOrderWebService"); _newline bsUtil.InvokeMethod("RunProcess", psIp, psOp); _newline } _newline if("AutoAsset"==strDoSubmit) //NandeeshS Added for Auto complete & Asset_newline_newline{_newline_newlineInputs.SetProperty("RowId", strOrderId);_newline_newlinefunc_usAutoAsset(Inputs, Outputs);_newline_newline} //NandeeshS Ended_newline } _newline } _newline } _newline } _newline //Outputs.SetProperty("Order Submit Error",psOp.GetProperty("Error Message"));_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code",strErrCode); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message",strErrMesg); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Order Id",strOrderId); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Root Order Item Id",strRootOLIIdInNewOrder); _newline bcAsset = null; _newline boAsset = null; _newline bcPick = null; _newline bcOLI = null; _newline bcOrder = null; _newline boOrder = null; _newline psIp = null; _newline psOp = null; _newline bsUtil = null; _newline return CancelOperation; _newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usCreateModifyOrderGeneric

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function func_usCreateOLIfromAssets(orderId,rootAssetId,promAssetId)_newline{_newline//queries asset as a IO, transforms into Order->OLI IO using a data map and then upserts_newline//enhanced to fetch the promotion asset also. Do we need to bring in other root assets if any under the common promotion? - Not for NOW_newline var psInp1:PropertySet = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline var psInp2:PropertySet = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline var psInp3:PropertySet = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline var psOp:PropertySet = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline// psInp1.SetProperty("PrimaryRowId", rootAssetId);_newline if(""!=promAssetId)_newline psInp1.SetProperty("SearchSpec", "[Line Item.Status]='Active' AND ([Header.Id]='" + rootAssetId + "' OR [Header.Id]='" + promAssetId + "')");_newline else_newline psInp1.SetProperty("SearchSpec", "[Line Item.Status]='Active' AND [Header.Id]='" + rootAssetId + "'");_newline psInp1.SetProperty("OutputIntObjectName", "SIS OM Asset");_newline var bsPMT:Service = TheApplication().GetService("EAI Siebel Adapter");_newline bsPMT.InvokeMethod("Query", psInp1, psOp);_newline_newline psInp2 = psOp.Copy();_newline psInp2.SetProperty("MapName", "SISOMPMTMap");_newline psInp2.SetProperty("Order Id", orderId);_newline psOp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline bsPMT = TheApplication().GetService("EAI Data Transformation Engine");_newline bsPMT.InvokeMethod("Execute", psInp2, psOp);_newline_newline psInp3 = psOp.Copy();_newline psOp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline bsPMT = TheApplication().GetService("EAI Siebel Adapter");_newline bsPMT.InvokeMethod("Upsert", psInp3, psOp);_newline_newline bsPMT = null;_newline psInp1 = null;_newline psInp2 = null;_newline psInp3 = null;_newline psOp = null;_newline return;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usCreateOLIfromAssets

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function func_usCreateTicket(Inputs,Outputs) _newline{//mandatory inputs: TicketScenario, RefNumber _newline var strErrCode = "OK"; _newline var strErrMesg = ""; _newline var strSRId = ""; _newline var strTicketScenario = Inputs.GetProperty("TicketScenario"); _newline var strRefNumber = Inputs.GetProperty("Ext Ref Id"); _newline var strAccountId = Inputs.GetProperty("Account Id"); _newline var strProductId = Inputs.GetProperty("Product Id"); _newline var strAssetId = Inputs.GetProperty("Root Asset Id"); _newline if(""==strAssetId) strAssetId = Inputs.GetProperty("Asset Id"); _newline var strMSISDN = Inputs.GetProperty("MSISDN"); _newline var boSR, bcSR;_newline boSR = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Service Request"); _newline bcSR = boSR.GetBusComp("Service Request"); _newline bcSR.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline bcSR.ActivateMultipleFields(func_usMultiFields("Service Request"));_newline if("TT_usSTAR_usDISCONNECT" == strTicketScenario) _newline { _newline/* _newlineMandatory inputs: MSISDN, Account Id, Product Id _newline_newlinesimply create a SR for the Disconnection EDR for a star number customer _newline------------------------------------------------------ _newlineXML Tag:SR BC Field:Sample _newline------------------------------------------------------ _newlineAbstract:Abstract:This is a STAR number _newlineAccountId:Account Id:1-UCD1I _newlineArea:Area:AIA _newlineDescription:Description:This is a STAR Number.Customer has not recharged for last 180 days and hence is the MSISDN is due for disconnect. Please contact customer and inform him to recharge or his Star number will be disconnected. _newlineIntegrationId:Integration Id:248274651 _newlineOwner:Owner:SADMIN _newlinePriority:Priority:1 _newlineProductId:Product Id:1-H7XJ _newlineSerialNumber:Serial Number:97477750887 _newlineSeverity:Severity:1 _newlineSource:Source:AIA _newlineStatus:Status:Not Solved _newlineSub-AreaNoConstrain:Sub-Area No Constrain:0 _newlineSub-Status:Sub-Status:First Escalation _newlineTicketType:Ticket Type:Customer Trouble Ticket _newline*/ _newline var strDescr = "This is a STAR Number.Customer has not recharged for last 180 days and hence is the MSISDN is due for disconnect. "; _newline strDescr = strDescr + "Please contact customer and inform him to recharge or his Star number will be disconnected."; _newline bcSR.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcSR.SetSearchExpr("[Account Id]='" + strAccountId + "' AND [Integration Id]='" + strRefNumber + "'"); _newline bcSR.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline if(!bcSR.FirstRecord()) _newline { _newline bcSR.NewRecord(NewAfter); _newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("Description", strDescr); _newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("Integration Id", strRefNumber); _newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("Account Id", strAccountId); _newline var bcAssetPick:BusComp = bcSR.GetPicklistBusComp("Serial Number"); _newline bcAssetPick.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline bcAssetPick.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcAssetPick.SetSearchExpr("[Serial Number]='" + strMSISDN + "' AND [Parent Asset Id] IS NULL"); _newline bcAssetPick.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline if(bcAssetPick.FirstRecord()) _newline { _newline bcAssetPick.Pick(); _newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("Area", "AIA"); _newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("Abstract", "This is a STAR number"); _newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("Owner", "SADMIN"); _newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("Priority", "1"); _newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("Severity", "1"); _newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("Source", "AIA"); _newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("Status", "Not Solved"); _newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("Sub-Status", "First Escalation"); _newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("Ticket Type", "Customer Trouble Ticket"); _newline bcSR.WriteRecord(); _newline strSRId = bcSR.GetFieldValue("Id"); _newline } _newline else _newline { _newline strErrCode = "ASSET_usPICK_usFAILED"; _newline strErrMesg = "Asset for " + strMSISDN + " could not be selected for the SR."; _newline } _newline } _newline else _newline { _newline strSRId = bcSR.GetFieldValue("Id"); _newline strErrCode = "SR_usEXISTS"; _newline strErrMesg = "SR for the reference number " + strRefNumber + " already exists."; _newline } _newline }_newline else if("SUSPEND_usRESUME" == strTicketScenario)_newline {_newline bcSR.NewRecord(NewAfter); _newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("INS Product", "Request"); _newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("INS Area", "Service Related"); _newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("INS Sub-Area", "Suspend Resume"); _newline// bcSR.SetFieldValue("CEM Planned Start Date", ); _newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("Account Id", strAccountId); _newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("Product Id", strProductId); _newline bcSR.SetFieldValue("Asset Id", strAssetId); _newline bcSR.WriteRecord(); _newline strSRId = bcSR.GetFieldValue("Id"); _newline }_newline else _newline { _newline strErrCode = "UNSUPPORTED_usSR_usSCENARIO"; _newline strErrMesg = "Scenario " + strTicketScenario + " for Service Request process is not supported."; _newline }_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", strErrCode); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", strErrMesg); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("SR Id", strSRId); _newline boSR = null;_newline bcSR = null;_newline return CancelOperation; _newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usCreateTicket

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function func_usDisconnectOrder(Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newline//this will fetch in the non-Promotion root asset id reference_newline//find the parent promotion if any_newline//if there is no other peer asset under the parent promotion, then include the promotion asset also for disconnection_newline var strOrderId="";_newline var strErrCode="OK";_newline var strErrMesg="";_newline var strAssetIntegId = Inputs.GetProperty("Integration Id");//rowid:1-UITVX, integid:1-UIS3O_newline var strAccntId = Inputs.GetProperty("Account Id"); //1-4HLIH_newline var strConId = Inputs.GetProperty("Contact Id"); //1-4HL8V_newline var strCIPId = Inputs.GetProperty("Billing Profile Id"); //1-4HLJV_newline var strExtRef= Inputs.GetProperty("Ext Ref Id"); //test_newline var strDiscReason= Inputs.GetProperty("Reason");_newline var strRelatedAssetIntegIdList="";_newline var bcAsset,boAsset,arrIntegList;_newline var psIp,psOp,boOrder,bcOrder,bcOLI,bsUtil,isRec;_newline try_newline {_newline boAsset = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Asset Management");_newline bcAsset = boAsset.GetBusComp("Asset Mgmt - Asset");_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Integration Id");_newline bcAsset.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcAsset.ClearToQuery();_newline bcAsset.SetSearchExpr("[Prod Prom Instance Id]='" + strAssetIntegId + "'");_newline bcAsset.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline isRec=bcAsset.FirstRecord();_newline while(isRec)_newline {_newline strRelatedAssetIntegIdList=strRelatedAssetIntegIdList + bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Integration Id") + ";";_newline isRec=bcAsset.NextRecord();_newline }_newline_newline psIp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline psOp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline bsUtil = TheApplication().GetService("Workflow Process Manager");_newline psIp.SetProperty("AccountId", strAccntId);_newline psIp.SetProperty("ProcessName", "SISOMDisconnectWebService-Order");_newline psIp.SetProperty("AssetIntegrationId", strAssetIntegId);_newline bsUtil.InvokeMethod("RunProcess", psIp, psOp);_newline strOrderId = psOp.GetProperty("ActiveDocumentId");_newline//call it on other related RCP assets also if any_newline if(""!=strRelatedAssetIntegIdList)_newline {_newline arrIntegList=strRelatedAssetIntegIdList.split(";");_newline for(var i=0;i<arrIntegList.length;i++)_newline {_newline if(""!=arrIntegList[i])_newline {_newline psIp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline psIp.GetProperty("ActiveDocumentId",strOrderId);_newline psIp.SetProperty("AccountId", strAccntId);_newline psIp.SetProperty("ProcessName", "SISOMDisconnectWebService-Order");_newline psIp.SetProperty("AssetIntegrationId", arrIntegList[i]);_newline psOp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline bsUtil.InvokeMethod("RunProcess", psIp, psOp);_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline if(""!=strOrderId)_newline {_newline boOrder = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Order Entry (Sales)");_newline bcOrder = boOrder.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Orders");_newline bcOrder.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Contact Id");_newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Billing Profile Id");_newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Cancel Reason");_newline bcOrder.InvokeMethod("SetAdminMode", "TRUE");_newline bcOrder.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOrder.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strOrderId + "'");_newline bcOrder.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcOrder.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline//set fields on order_newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Contact Id", strConId);_newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Billing Profile Id", strCIPId);_newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Cancel Reason", strDiscReason);_newline bcOrder.WriteRecord();_newline if(""!=strDiscReason)_newline {_newline//set Cancel Reason on the root OLI_newline bcOLI = boOrder.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Line Items");_newline bcOLI.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcOLI.InvokeMethod("SetAdminMode", "TRUE");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Cancel Reason");_newline bcOLI.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOLI.SetSearchExpr("[Parent Order Item Id] IS NULL");_newline bcOLI.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline isRec = bcOLI.FirstRecord();_newline while(isRec)_newline {_newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Cancel Reason",strDiscReason);_newline bcOLI.WriteRecord();_newline isRec = bcOLI.NextRecord();_newline }_newline }_newline//submit the order_newline bsUtil = TheApplication().GetService("Workflow Process Manager");_newline psIp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline psOp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline psIp.SetProperty("RowId", strOrderId);_newline psIp.SetProperty("ProcessName", "SISOMBillingSubmitOrderWebService");_newline bsUtil.InvokeMethod("RunProcess", psIp, psOp);_newline strErrCode = "OK";_newline strErrMesg = "Order submitted.";_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline catch(e)_newline {_newline strErrCode = "DISCONNECT_usERR";_newline strErrMesg = e.errCode + ":" + e.errText;_newline }_newline bsUtil=null;_newline psIp=null;_newline psOp=null;_newline bcOLI=null;_newline bcOrder=null;_newline boOrder=null;_newline bcAsset=null;_newline boAsset=null;_newline Outputs.SetProperty("OrderId",strOrderId)_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code",strErrCode)_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message",strErrMesg)_newline return CancelOperation;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usDisconnectOrder

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function func_usGetAccountType(Inputs,Outputs)_newline{_newline var strMSISDN = Inputs.GetProperty("MSISDN");_newline var strAccId = "";_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", "OK");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", "");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Root Asset Id", "");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Root Product", "");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Account Id", "");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Service Account Id", "");_newline var strRootAssetId = "";_newline var boAsset:BusObject = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Asset Management");_newline var bcAsset:BusComp = boAsset.GetBusComp("Asset Mgmt - Asset");_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Service Account Id");_newline bcAsset.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcAsset.ClearToQuery();_newline bcAsset.SetSearchExpr("[Serial Number]='" + strMSISDN + "' AND [Status]='Active' AND [Parent Asset Id] IS NULL");_newline bcAsset.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcAsset.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline strRootAssetId = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Id");_newline strAccId = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Service Account Id");_newline //TheApplication().RaiseErrorText("Message" + strAccId);_newline var boAccount:BusObject = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Account");_newline var bcAccount:BusComp = boAccount.GetBusComp("Account");//child assets_newline bcAccount.ActivateField("Payment Type");_newline bcAccount.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcAccount.ClearToQuery();_newline bcAccount.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strAccId + "' AND [Payment Type] = 'Prepaid'");_newline bcAccount.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline _newline if(bcAccount.FirstRecord()) _newline{ _newline var strAccType = "Prepaid";_newline //TheApplication().RaiseErrorText("Message" + strAccType);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Account Type", strAccType);_newline _newline// else_newline //var strAccType = 'Postpaid';_newline}_newlineelse_newline{_newline var strAccType = 'Postpaid';_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Account Type", strAccType); _newline}_newline }_newline bcAsset=null;_newline boAsset=null;_newlineboAccount = null;_newlinebcAccount = null;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usGetAccountType

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function func_usGetAssetForMSISDN(Inputs,Outputs)_newline{_newline var strMSISDN = Inputs.GetProperty("MSISDN");_newline var strAccId = "", prodFound=false;_newline var strRecordType = Inputs.GetProperty("RecordType");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Parent Product Name", "");//EDRs like 1,2_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", "OK");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", "");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Root Asset Id", "");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Root Product", "");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Account Id", "");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Service Account Id", "");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Billing Account Id", "");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Billing Profile Id", "");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Asset Integration Id", "");_newline var strProdPromInstId= "";_newline var strRootAssetId = "";_newline var boAsset, bcAsset, bcAXA, boProd1, bcProd1, bcProdRel1,boCIP,bcCIP;_newline var strPlanAssetId = "", strParentAssetProdName = "", strCIPId="", strPayProId="",strPayProPayMeth="";_newline boAsset = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Asset Management");_newline bcAsset = boAsset.GetBusComp("Asset Mgmt - Asset");_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Prod Prom Instance Id");_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Product Name");_newline
