Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function func_usGetPortsOfProduct(Inputs, Outputs) _newline{ _newline/* _newlineThis function takes in product Id (or name?) and gets the ports of the product _newlinethen for each port it recursively gets the ports and populates a propset of following format _newline <AllPorts id="prod_usroot"> _newline <GetAllPorts id="prod1"> _newline <Port Class_usspcId="....." .......></Port> _newline </GetAllPorts> _newline <GetAllPorts id="prod2"> _newline <Port Class_usspcId="....." .......></Port> _newline </GetAllPorts> _newline </AllPorts> _newline*/ _newline//if prod id is not given then retrive it from Product Name _newline var strRootProdId = Inputs.GetProperty("Product Id"); _newline var strRootProdName = Inputs.GetProperty("Product Name"); _newline if(""==strRootProdName && ""==strRootProdId) _newline { _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code","PROD_usID_usNAME_usREQD") _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message","Either Product Id or Product Name must be provided as input.") _newline } _newline else _newline { _newline if(""==strRootProdId) _newline { _newline var boProd:BusObject = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Internal Product"); _newline var bcProd:BusComp = boProd.GetBusComp("Internal Product"); _newline bcProd.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline bcProd.ActivateField("Id"); _newline bcProd.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcProd.SetSearchExpr("[Name]='"+ strRootProdName +"'"); _newline bcProd.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline if(bcProd.FirstRecord()) _newline strRootProdId = bcProd.GetFieldValue("Id"); _newline bcProd=null; _newline boProd=null; _newline } _newline if(""==strRootProdId) _newline { _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code","PROD_usNOT_usFOUND") _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message","Product with given Name was not found.") _newline } _newline else _newline { _newline psOUT = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline psOUT.SetType("AllPorts"); _newline psOUT.SetProperty("id",strRootProdId); _newline func_usGetPortsOfProduct_ussub(strRootProdId); _newline//now transform it using XSL into a flat structure _newline//and load an array which can be used for processing _newline var bsXMLUtil:Service; _newline var psOp:PropertySet=TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline bsXMLUtil = TheApplication().GetService("XML Converter"); _newline bsXMLUtil.InvokeMethod("PropSetToXML",psOUT,psOp); _newline//crude way to chop off UTF-8 and set UTF-16 _newline var strXML:String = psOp.GetValue(); _newline strXML = "<?xml version='1.0' encoding=\"UTF-16\"?>" + strXML.substr(80);//38+42 _newline psOp.SetValue(strXML); _newline/* Outputs.AddChild(psOp); _newline bsXMLUtil = TheApplication().GetService("Transcode Service"); _newline psOp.SetProperty("ConversionMode", "EncodingToEncoding"); _newline psOp.SetProperty("Source Encoding Name", "UTF-8"); _newline psOp.SetProperty("Target Encoding Name", "UTF-16"); _newline bsXMLUtil.InvokeMethod("Convert",psOp,psOp); _newline*/ _newline var strXSL=""; _newline strXSL = strXSL + "<?xml version='1.0' encoding=\"UTF-16\"?><xsl:stylesheet version='1.0' xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform'>"; _newline strXSL = strXSL + "<xsl:template match='/'><GetAllPortsSimple><xsl:for-each select='AllPorts/GetAllPorts'><xsl:for-each select='Port/PortObject'><Product>"; _newline strXSL = strXSL + "<xsl:attribute name='RootProductId'><xsl:value-of select='./parent::Port/parent::GetAllPorts/parent::AllPorts/@id'/></xsl:attribute>"; _newline strXSL = strXSL + "<xsl:attribute name='ProductId'><xsl:value-of select='./parent::Port/parent::GetAllPorts/@id'/></xsl:attribute>"; _newline strXSL = strXSL + "<xsl:attribute name='PortName'><xsl:value-of select='./parent::Port/@Name'/></xsl:attribute>"; _newline strXSL = strXSL + "<xsl:attribute name='PortProductName'><xsl:value-of select='@Name'/></xsl:attribute>"; _newline strXSL = strXSL + "<xsl:attribute name='PortProductId'><xsl:value-of select='@Product_usspcId'/></xsl:attribute>"; _newline strXSL = strXSL + "<xsl:attribute name='AssemblyPortId'><xsl:value-of select='./parent::Port/@Port_usspcItem_usspcId'/></xsl:attribute>"; _newline strXSL = strXSL + "<xsl:attribute name='PortValidProdId'><xsl:value-of select='@Prod_usspcItem_usspcId'/></xsl:attribute>"; _newline strXSL = strXSL + "<xsl:attribute name='IsDefault'><xsl:value-of select='@Default'/></xsl:attribute>"; _newline strXSL = strXSL + "</Product></xsl:for-each></xsl:for-each></GetAllPortsSimple></xsl:template></xsl:stylesheet>"; _newline _newline Outputs.SetProperty("XSLTBuffer",strXSL); _newline _newline bsXMLUtil = TheApplication().GetService("EAI XSLT Service"); _newline psOp.SetProperty("XSLTBuffer",strXSL); _newline bsXMLUtil.InvokeMethod("Transform",psOp,psOp); _newline//convert back to propset _newline psProdMaster = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline bsXMLUtil = TheApplication().GetService("XML Converter"); _newline bsXMLUtil.InvokeMethod("XMLToPropSet",psOp,psProdMaster); _newline//postprocess - retrive additional product fields _newline var strFieldList = Inputs.GetProperty("FieldList"); _newline if(""!=strFieldList) _newline { _newline var arrFieldList = strFieldList.split(";"); _newline if(0!=arrFieldList.length) _newline { _newline var boProdMain:BusObject = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Admin ISS Product Definition"); _newline var bcProdMain:BusComp = boProdMain.GetBusComp("Internal Product - ISS Admin"); _newline bcProdMain.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline for(var iFld=0;iFld<arrFieldList.length;iFld++) _newline { _newline var arrFldDet=(arrFieldList[iFld]).split(":"); _newline bcProdMain.ActivateField(arrFldDet[0]); _newline } _newline bcProdMain.ClearToQuery(); _newline var strCurrProdId=""; _newline for(var iProdCnt=0;iProdCnt < psProdMaster.GetChildCount();iProdCnt++) _newline { _newline strCurrProdId=psProdMaster.GetChild(iProdCnt).GetProperty("PortProductId"); _newline bcProdMain.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='"+ strCurrProdId +"'"); _newline bcProdMain.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline if(bcProdMain.FirstRecord()) _newline { _newline for(var iFld=0;iFld<arrFieldList.length;iFld++) _newline { _newline var arrFldDet=(arrFieldList[iFld]).split(":"); _newline if(1<arrFldDet.length) _newline psProdMaster.GetChild(iProdCnt).SetProperty(arrFldDet[1],bcProdMain.GetFieldValue(arrFldDet[0])); _newline else _newline psProdMaster.GetChild(iProdCnt).SetProperty(arrFldDet[0],bcProdMain.GetFieldValue(arrFldDet[0])); _newline } _newline } _newline } _newline bcProdMain=null; _newline boProdMain=null; _newline } _newline } _newline var strPriceListId=Inputs.GetProperty("Price List Id"); _newline if(""!=strPriceListId)//if this is specified then the product will be set with the price in a standard tag Price _newline { _newline var boPriceMain:BusObject = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Price List"); _newline var bcPriceMain:BusComp = boPriceMain.GetBusComp("Price List Item"); _newline var strProdPrice=""; _newline bcPriceMain.ActivateField("Original List Price"); _newline bcPriceMain.ActivateField("Promotional Price"); _newline bcPriceMain.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline for(var iProdCnt=0;iProdCnt < psProdMaster.GetChildCount();iProdCnt++) _newline { _newline bcPriceMain.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcPriceMain.SetSearchExpr("[Product Id]='"+ psProdMaster.GetChild(iProdCnt).GetProperty("PortProductId") +"' AND [Price List Id]='" + strPriceListId + "'"); _newline bcPriceMain.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline if(bcPriceMain.FirstRecord()) _newline { _newline strProdPrice = bcPriceMain.GetFieldValue("Promotional Price"); _newline if(""==strProdPrice) _newline strProdPrice = bcPriceMain.GetFieldValue("Original List Price"); _newline if(""!=strProdPrice) _newline psProdMaster.GetChild(iProdCnt).SetProperty("Price",strProdPrice); _newline } _newline } _newline bcProdMain=null; _newline boPriceMain=null; _newline } _newline//write to file if requested _newline var strFileName = Inputs.GetProperty("FileName"); _newline if(""!=strFileName) _newline { _newline bsXMLUtil = TheApplication().GetService("EAI XML Write to File"); _newline psProdMaster.SetProperty("FileName", strFileName);//normalize the name _newline bsXMLUtil.InvokeMethod("WritePropSet", psProdMaster, Outputs); _newline bsXMLUtil = null; _newline } _newline Outputs.AddChild(psProdMaster); _newline } _newline } _newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usGetPortsOfProduct

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function func_usGetPortsOfProduct_ussub(prodId) _newline{ _newline var bsRCOIS:Service = TheApplication().GetService("Remote Complex Object Instance Service"); _newline var psIp:PropertySet = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline var psOp:PropertySet = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline psIp.SetProperty("Product Id",prodId); _newline psIp.SetProperty("GetPortDomain","Y"); _newline bsRCOIS.InvokeMethod("GetAllPorts",psIp,psOp); _newline psOp.SetProperty("id",prodId); _newline if(0!=psOp.GetChildCount()) _newline { _newline psOUT.AddChild(psOp); _newline// psOp.SetProperty("ChldCnt_us"+ prodId,psOp.GetChildCount()); _newline _newline LogPropSet(psOp,"getports_us" + prodId); _newline LogPropSet(psOUT,"cumm_usgetports_us" + prodId); _newline _newline for(var iPortCnt=0; iPortCnt < psOp.GetChildCount();iPortCnt++) _newline { _newline// psOp.SetProperty("GChldCnt_us"+ prodId + "_us" + iPortCnt, psOp.GetChild(iPortCnt).GetChildCount()); _newline for(var iPortObjCnt=0; iPortObjCnt < psOp.GetChild(iPortCnt).GetChildCount();iPortObjCnt++) _newline { _newline var strSubProdId = psOp.GetChild(iPortCnt).GetChild(iPortObjCnt).GetProperty("Product Id"); _newline func_usGetPortsOfProduct_ussub(strSubProdId); _newline } _newline } _newline } _newline return; _newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usGetPortsOfProduct_ussub

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: /*-------+------+--------+----------------------------------------------_newlineYYYYMMDD | Ver | By | Description of Change_newline---------+------+--------+----------------------------------------------_newline20131217 | 1.00 | PPB | First version_newline---------+------+--------+--------------------------------------------*/_newlinefunction func_usLoadBPRecordsfromFile(Inputs, Outputs) _newline{ _newline var strFilePath = Inputs.GetProperty("DirectoryPath"); _newline var strFileName = Inputs.GetProperty("FileName"); _newline var strBatchType = Inputs.GetProperty("BatchType"); _newline var iSkipHdrLineCnt = Inputs.GetProperty("Header Lines to Skip"); _newline var iSkipFtrLineCnt = Inputs.GetProperty("Footer Lines to Skip"); _newline var strDelimChar = Inputs.GetProperty("Delimiter"); _newline if(""==iSkipHdrLineCnt) iSkipHdrLineCnt=1;//BP will have header :-)_newline if(""==iSkipFtrLineCnt) iSkipFtrLineCnt=0; _newline if(""==strDelimChar) strDelimChar=","; _newline_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Delim Char",strDelimChar); _newline//gets a file name and reads the line to create records in batch _newline var bsFile:Service = TheApplication().GetService("EAI File Transport"); _newline var psInp:PropertySet = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline var psOp:PropertySet = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline psInp.SetProperty("FileName", strFilePath + strFileName); _newline psInp.SetProperty("IsReceivingTextData", "true"); _newline bsFile.InvokeMethod("Receive",psInp, psOp); _newline_newline psInp = psOp.Copy(); _newline bsFile = TheApplication().GetService("Transcode Service"); _newline psInp.SetProperty("SourceEncoding","UTF-8"); _newline psInp.SetProperty("ConversionMode","EncodingToString"); _newline bsFile.InvokeMethod("Convert",psInp, psOp); _newline_newline var strFileText = psOp.GetValue(); _newline var iCnt = 0; _newline var iCntLoadFailed = 0; _newline var arrFileLines = strFileText.split("\n"); _newline var strFileLineText = ""; _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Number Of Lines", arrFileLines.length); _newline bsFile = TheApplication().GetService("Workflow Process Manager"); _newline for(var i = iSkipHdrLineCnt; i < arrFileLines.length; i++)_newline { _newline strFileLineText = arrFileLines[i]; _newline_newline// Outputs.SetProperty("Line" + i,strFileLineText); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("LineLength" + i,strFileLineText.length); _newline if("" != strFileLineText) _newline { _newline iCnt++; _newline strFileLineText = strFileLineText.substring(0,strFileLineText.length-1); _newline var arrFileLine = strFileLineText.split(","); _newline//now setup the inidividual columns in the input properties of loader workflow _newline psInp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline psOp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline var strRecordType = "BP"; _newline psInp.SetProperty("BatchType", strBatchType); _newline psInp.SetProperty("BatchId", strFileName); _newline psInp.SetProperty("Attrib02", arrFileLine[0]);//SIM_newline psInp.SetProperty("RecordId", arrFileLine[1]);//MSISDN _newline psInp.SetProperty("Attrib01", arrFileLine[2]);//token _newline psInp.SetProperty("Attrib03", "Default_usPreactivationOrder");//plan or favorite name must come from file_newline psInp.SetProperty("ProcessName", "TMBatchRecordCreator"); _newline bsFile.InvokeMethod("RunProcess", psInp, psOp); _newline if("" != psOp.GetProperty("Error Code")) _newline { _newline iCntLoadFailed++; _newline } _newline }_newline }_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Number Of Lines Read", iCnt); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Number Of Lines Loaded", iCnt - iCntLoadFailed); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", "OK"); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", "Number Of Lines Read: " + iCnt + ", Number Of Lines Loaded: " + (iCnt - iCntLoadFailed)); _newline bsFile = null; _newline psInp = null; _newline psOp = null; _newline return CancelOperation; _newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usLoadBPRecordsfromFile

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function func_usLoadBRMBatch(Inputs,Outputs)_newline{_newline//an EBC is used to fetch the records from ext db (BRM) in batches_newline var isBatchRec = false;_newline var iCntLoadFailed = 0;_newline var iCnt = 0;_newline var strErrCode = "OK";_newline var strErrMesg = "";_newline var strBatchType = "";_newline var strBatchNum = Inputs.GetProperty("BatchNumber");_newline var strElecProfile = "";_newline if(""==strBatchNum)_newline {_newline strErrCode = "BATCH_usNUM_usMISSING";_newline strErrMesg = "Batch Number must be specified as input.";_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline var boBatchSrc:BusObject = TheApplication().GetBusObject("TM BRM Batches BO");_newline var bcBatchSrc:BusComp = boBatchSrc.GetBusComp("TM BRM Batches BC");_newline bcBatchSrc.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcBatchSrc.ActivateField("Batch Type");_newline bcBatchSrc.ActivateField("Attrib01");_newline bcBatchSrc.ActivateField("Attrib02");_newline bcBatchSrc.ActivateField("Attrib03");_newline bcBatchSrc.ActivateField("Attrib04");_newline bcBatchSrc.ActivateField("Attrib11");_newline bcBatchSrc.ActivateField("MSISDN");_newline bcBatchSrc.ClearToQuery();_newline bcBatchSrc.SetSearchExpr("[Batch Number]='" + strBatchNum + "'");_newline bcBatchSrc.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline isBatchRec = bcBatchSrc.FirstRecord();_newline var psInp:PropertySet = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline var psOp:PropertySet = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline var bsFile:Service = TheApplication().GetService("Workflow Process Manager");_newline psInp.SetProperty("ProcessName", "TMBatchRecordCreator");_newline psInp.SetProperty("BatchId", strBatchNum);_newline while(isBatchRec)_newline {_newline//now load_newline iCnt++;_newline strBatchType = bcBatchSrc.GetFieldValue("Batch Type");_newline strElecProfile = bcBatchSrc.GetFieldValue("Attrib03");_newline if("BP"==strBatchType)_newline {_newline psInp.SetProperty("BatchType", strBatchType);_newline psInp.SetProperty("RecordId", bcBatchSrc.GetFieldValue("MSISDN")); //MSISDN_newline psInp.SetProperty("Attrib01", bcBatchSrc.GetFieldValue("Attrib01"));//Reservation Token_newline psInp.SetProperty("Attrib02", bcBatchSrc.GetFieldValue("Attrib02"));//SIM Number_newline if("4.0" == strElecProfile || "5.0" == strElecProfile)//VMT Type based on SIM Electrical Profile_newline psInp.SetProperty("Attrib03", "VMT");_newline else_newline psInp.SetProperty("Attrib03", "");_newline_newline psInp.SetProperty("Attrib04", "Default_usPreactivationOrder");//plan name, hardcoded for now, can come in later_newline psInp.SetProperty("Attrib05", "E:" + bcBatchSrc.GetFieldValue("Attrib03") + ";G:" + bcBatchSrc.GetFieldValue("Attrib04"));//SIM Electrical & Graphical Profile concatenated - not used_newline psInp.SetProperty("Attrib11", bcBatchSrc.GetFieldValue("Attrib11"));//Reservation expiry date, not used_newline bsFile.InvokeMethod("RunProcess", psInp, psOp);_newline if("" != psOp.GetProperty("Error Code"))_newline {_newline iCntLoadFailed++;_newline }_newline }_newline isBatchRec = bcBatchSrc.NextRecord();_newline }_newline bcBatchSrc = null;_newline boBatchSrc = null;_newline bsFile = null;_newline psInp = null;_newline psOp = null;_newline strErrCode = "OK";_newline strErrMesg = "Batch Numvber " + strBatchNum + " processed. Total records " + iCnt + ", failed " + iCntLoadFailed;_newline }_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", strErrCode);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", strErrMesg);_newline return CancelOperation;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usLoadBRMBatch

Business_spcService_spcScript.Comments: [JUHIV][08.05.2012][Load BestMate record in CRM from files sent by BRM]
Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function func_usLoadBestmateRecords(Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newline var strFilePath = Inputs.GetProperty("DirectoryPath");_newline var strFileName = Inputs.GetProperty("FileName");_newline var strBatchType = Inputs.GetProperty("BatchType");_newline var iSkipHdrLineCnt = Inputs.GetProperty("Header Lines to Skip");_newline var iSkipFtrLineCnt = Inputs.GetProperty("Footer Lines to Skip");_newline var strDelimChar = Inputs.GetProperty("Delimiter");_newline if(""==iSkipHdrLineCnt)_newline iSkipHdrLineCnt=0;_newline if(""==iSkipFtrLineCnt)_newline iSkipFtrLineCnt=0;_newline if(""==strDelimChar)_newline strDelimChar=",";_newline_newlineOutputs.SetProperty("Delim Char",strDelimChar);_newline//gets a file name and reads the line to create records in batch _newline var bsFile:Service = TheApplication().GetService("EAI File Transport");_newline var psInp:PropertySet = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline var psOp:PropertySet = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline psInp.SetProperty("FileName", strFilePath + strFileName);_newline psInp.SetProperty("IsReceivingTextData", "true");_newline bsFile.InvokeMethod("Receive",psInp, psOp);_newline_newline psInp = psOp.Copy();_newline bsFile = TheApplication().GetService("Transcode Service");_newline psInp.SetProperty("SourceEncoding","UTF-8");_newline psInp.SetProperty("ConversionMode","EncodingToString");_newline bsFile.InvokeMethod("Convert",psInp, psOp);_newline var strFileText = psOp.GetValue();_newline_newline var iCnt = 0;_newline var iCntLoadFailed = 0;_newline var arrFileLines = strFileText.split("\n");_newline// var arrFileLine;//represents one each line in the file_newline var strFileLineText = "";_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Number Of Lines", arrFileLines.length);_newline bsFile = TheApplication().GetService("Workflow Process Manager");_newline// for(var i = 0; i < 10; i++)//extra -1 is to ignore last carriage return_newline// var i=0;_newline// for(i = -1 + iSkipHdrLineCnt; i < arrFileLines.length - iSkipFtrLineCnt -1; i++)//extra -1 is to ignore last carriage return_newline for(var i = 0; i < arrFileLines.length; i++)//extra -1 is to ignore last carriage return_newline {_newline strFileLineText = arrFileLines[i];_newline_newline Outputs.SetProperty("LineLength" + i,strFileLineText.length);_newline if("" != strFileLineText)_newline {_newline iCnt++;_newline strFileLineText = strFileLineText.substring(0,strFileLineText.length);_newline var arrFileLine = strFileLineText.split(",");_newline _newline //now setup the inidividual columns in the input properties of loader workflow_newline psInp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline psOp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline var strRecordType = arrFileLine[0];_newline var strActionType = arrFileLine[1];_newline var strBestMateNum = arrFileLine[2];_newline var strPortOutNum = arrFileLine[3];_newline_newline psInp.SetProperty("BatchType", strBatchType);_newline psInp.SetProperty("BatchId", strFileName);_newline psInp.SetProperty("RecordId", i);_newline psInp.SetProperty("Attrib01", strRecordType);_newline psInp.SetProperty("Attrib02", strActionType);_newline psInp.SetProperty("Attrib03", strBestMateNum);_newline psInp.SetProperty("Attrib04", strPortOutNum);_newline _newline psInp.SetProperty("ProcessName", "TMBatchRecordCreator");_newline bsFile.InvokeMethod("RunProcess", psInp, psOp);_newline if("" != psOp.GetProperty("Error Code"))_newline {_newline iCntLoadFailed++;_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Number Of Lines Read", iCnt);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Number Of Lines Loaded", iCnt - iCntLoadFailed);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", "OK");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", "Number Of Lines Read: " + iCnt + ", Number Of Lines Loaded: " + (iCnt - iCntLoadFailed));_newline bsFile = null;_newline psInp = null;_newline psOp = null;_newline return CancelOperation;_newline}

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function func_usLoadRecordsfromFile(Inputs, Outputs) _newline{ _newline// Included Loading of EDR records for R-6 EDR Types _newline// Handled Loading ANNIVERSARY Edrs with no unique Record Id. These EDRs are coming with 'e' in several fields. _newline var strFilePath = Inputs.GetProperty("DirectoryPath"); _newline var strFileName = Inputs.GetProperty("FileName"); _newline var strBatchType = Inputs.GetProperty("BatchType"); _newline var iSkipHdrLineCnt = Inputs.GetProperty("Header Lines to Skip"); _newline var iSkipFtrLineCnt = Inputs.GetProperty("Footer Lines to Skip"); _newline var strDelimChar = Inputs.GetProperty("Delimiter"); _newline if(""==iSkipHdrLineCnt) _newline iSkipHdrLineCnt=0; _newline if(""==iSkipFtrLineCnt) _newline iSkipFtrLineCnt=0; _newline if(""==strDelimChar) _newline strDelimChar=","; _newline _newlineOutputs.SetProperty("Delim Char",strDelimChar); _newline//gets a file name and reads the line to create records in batch _newline var bsFile:Service = TheApplication().GetService("EAI File Transport"); _newline var psInp:PropertySet = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline var psOp:PropertySet = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline psInp.SetProperty("FileName", strFilePath + strFileName); _newline psInp.SetProperty("IsReceivingTextData", "true"); _newline bsFile.InvokeMethod("Receive",psInp, psOp); _newline _newline psInp = psOp.Copy(); _newline bsFile = TheApplication().GetService("Transcode Service"); _newline psInp.SetProperty("SourceEncoding","UTF-8"); _newline psInp.SetProperty("ConversionMode","EncodingToString"); _newline bsFile.InvokeMethod("Convert",psInp, psOp); _newline var strFileText = psOp.GetValue(); _newline// Outputs.SetValue(strFileText); _newline _newline var iCnt = 0; _newline var iCntLoadFailed = 0; _newline var arrFileLines = strFileText.split("\n"); _newline// var arrFileLine;//represents one each line in the file _newline var strFileLineText = ""; _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Number Of Lines", arrFileLines.length); _newline bsFile = TheApplication().GetService("Workflow Process Manager"); _newline// for(var i = 0; i < 10; i++)//extra -1 is to ignore last carriage return _newline// var i=0; _newline// for(i = -1 + iSkipHdrLineCnt; i < arrFileLines.length - iSkipFtrLineCnt -1; i++)//extra -1 is to ignore last carriage return _newline for(var i = 0; i < arrFileLines.length; i++)//extra -1 is to ignore last carriage return _newline { _newline strFileLineText = arrFileLines[i]; _newline _newline// Outputs.SetProperty("Line" + i,strFileLineText); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("LineLength" + i,strFileLineText.length); _newline if("" != strFileLineText) _newline { _newline iCnt++; _newline strFileLineText = strFileLineText.substring(0,strFileLineText.length-1); _newline var arrFileLine = strFileLineText.split(","); _newline// for(var ii=0; ii<arrFileLine.length; ii++) _newline// Outputs.SetProperty("EDR"+i+" Field"+ii,arrFileLine[ii]); _newline _newline/* _newlineEDR TYPE DISCONNECT ADMIN-BAR REPLENISHMENT _newline------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- _newline 0 COL1 EDR EDR EDR EDR EDR EDR EDR EDR _newline 1 EVENT_usCODE DISCONNECT/SUB-DELETED ADMIN-BAR 2 ANNIVERSARY ANNIVERSARY BAL-EXPIRE BUCKET-ADD BUCKET-EXPIRE BUCKET-REPLENISHMENT _newline 2 EVENT_usID 20110902000005001001966860 20110722195320001001926906 20110711054717005077173366 20110923011147008006891321 e 20110923005153008001235265 20110923200345001118918684 20110923000312002111254123 20110924034455008118290490 _newline 3 COL4 00021966860 02011926906 09056891321 e 00091235265 02018918684 00031254123 09058290490 _newline 4 MSISDN 97477067784 97477027615 97477777105 97470079000 97477788839 97470012110 97477055034 97477307806 97470121631 _newline 5 TIME_usSTAMP 20110902000005 20110722195320 20110711054717 20110923011147 20110923080501 20110923005153 20110923200345 20110923000312 20110924034455 _newline 6 BUNDLE1 103 e _newline 7 AMOUNT 110.0 e _newline 8 COL9 e _newline 9 COL10 11 11 13 COSP2 13 11 11 18 _newline10 COL11 Red Red Freedom No Limit e Freedom No Limit Red Red Mobile Broadband for Business No Limit _newline11 BUNDLE2 103 e 656 656 155 _newline12 COL13 e Free Mobile Internet Free Mobile Internet Free Mobile Internet _newline13 COL14 e _newline14 COL15 e _newline15 COL16 e 70 _newline16 COL17 e _newline17 COL18 e _newlinePossible Replenishments for Freedom No Limit _newlineFreedom Replenishment 3 _newlineFreedom Replenishment 4 _newlineFreedom Replenishment 5 _newlineFreedom Replenishment 6 _newlineFreedom Replenishment 7 _newlineFreedom Replenishment 8 _newlineFreedom Replenishment 9 _newlineFreedom Replenishment 10 _newline*/ _newline _newline//now setup the inidividual columns in the input properties of loader workflow _newline psInp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline psOp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline var strRecordType = arrFileLine[1]; _newline var isBRMAnniv = false; _newline if("e" == arrFileLine[2]) _newline isBRMAnniv=true; _newline// Outputs.SetProperty("BRMAnniv_us"+i, isBRMAnniv); _newline var BalExp = 0; _newline BalExp = ToNumber(arrFileLine[15]); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("BalExp_us"+i, BalExp); _newline _newline psInp.SetProperty("BatchType", strBatchType); _newline psInp.SetProperty("BatchId", strFileName); _newline psInp.SetProperty("Attrib02", strRecordType);//is the record type or edr type _newline psInp.SetProperty("Attrib03", arrFileLine[4]); _newline psInp.SetProperty("Attrib23", BalExp); _newline if(isBRMAnniv) _newline psInp.SetProperty("RecordId", arrFileLine[4] + arrFileLine[5]); _newline else _newline psInp.SetProperty("RecordId", arrFileLine[2]); _newline _newline if("ANNIVERSARY" == strRecordType && isBRMAnniv) _newline psInp.SetProperty("Attrib01", "Freedom Monthly Limit");//productcode needs to be passed here _newline else _newline if("ANNIVERSARY" == strRecordType || "BAL-EXPIRE" == strRecordType || "THRESHOLD" == strRecordType || "SUB-DEBT" == strRecordType || "INSUFFICIENT-BALANCE" == strRecordType) _newline { _newline psInp.SetProperty("Attrib01", arrFileLine[10]);//product name needs to be passed here _newline// if("BAL-EXPIRE" == strRecordType )//price field _newline// psInp.SetProperty("Attrib23", 100); _newline } _newline _newline else _newline if( "BUCKET-ADD" == strRecordType || "BUCKET-EXPIRE" == strRecordType || "BUCKET-REPLENISHMENT" == strRecordType) _newline psInp.SetProperty("Attrib01", arrFileLine[11]); _newline else _newline psInp.SetProperty("Attrib01", arrFileLine[6]);//product code needs to be passed here _newline _newline //else if("ANNIVERSARY" == strRecordType || "e" == strAnniversary) _newline //psInp.SetProperty("Attrib01", arrFileLine[6]);//product needs to be passed here _newline _newline if(""!=arrFileLine[7] )//price field _newline psInp.SetProperty("Attrib21", arrFileLine[7]); _newline if ("CREDIT-LIMIT-REACHED" == strRecordType) _newline { _newline psInp.SetProperty("BatchType", "EDR_usDunn_usWarning"); _newline psInp.SetProperty("BatchId", "EDR_usDunning_usBatch"); _newline psInp.SetProperty("Attrib01", strFileName); _newline psInp.SetProperty("Attrib21", arrFileLine[18]); _newline psInp.SetProperty("Attrib05", arrFileLine[19]); _newline psInp.SetProperty("Attrib04", arrFileLine[20]); _newline } _newline psInp.SetProperty("ProcessName", "TMBatchRecordCreator"); _newline bsFile.InvokeMethod("RunProcess", psInp, psOp); _newline if("" != psOp.GetProperty("Error Code")) _newline { _newline iCntLoadFailed++; _newline } _newline } _newline } _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Number Of Lines Read", iCnt); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Number Of Lines Loaded", iCnt - iCntLoadFailed); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", "OK"); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", "Number Of Lines Read: " + iCnt + ", Number Of Lines Loaded: " + (iCnt - iCntLoadFailed)); _newline bsFile = null; _newline psInp = null; _newline psOp = null; _newline return CancelOperation; _newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usLoadRecordsfromFile

if("Account" == bcName)_newline {_newline psFldList.SetProperty("Status", "");_newline }_newline else if("Order Entry - Orders" == bcName)_newline {_newline psFldList.SetProperty("Status","");_newline psFldList.SetProperty("Back Office Order Number","");_newline psFldList.SetProperty("Id","");_newline psFldList.SetProperty("Status","");_newline psFldList.SetProperty("Billing Profile Id","");_newline psFldList.SetProperty("Back Office Order Number","");_newline psFldList.SetProperty("Sub Type","");_newline psFldList.SetProperty("Status","");_newline psFldList.SetProperty("Order Total","");_newline }_newline else if("Order Entry - Line Items" == bcName)_newline {_newline psFldList.SetProperty("Id","");_newline psFldList.SetProperty("Product", "");_newline Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function func_usPositionNewLineItemInOLITree(strOrderId,strTBDOLIId,strParentProductId,strProdItemId,strProductPortId)_newline{_newline var strRetVal = "OK";_newline var boOrder:BusObject = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Order Entry (Sales)");_newline var bcOLI:BusComp = boOrder.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Line Items (Simple)");_newline var strParentOLIId = "";_newline var strRootOLIId = "";_newline bcOLI.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcOLI.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Parent Order Item Id");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Root Order Item Id");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Prod Item Id");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Product Port Id");_newline//TheApplication().RaiseErrorText("parent:" + strOrderId + "," + strParentProductId + "," + strTBDOLIId);_newline bcOLI.SetSearchExpr("[Order Header Id]='" + strOrderId + "' AND [Product Id]='" + strParentProductId + "'");_newline bcOLI.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcOLI.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline strParentOLIId = bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Id");_newline strRootOLIId = bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Root Order Item Id");_newline bcOLI.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOLI.SetSearchExpr("[Order Header Id]='" + strOrderId + "' AND [Id]='" + strTBDOLIId + "'");_newline bcOLI.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcOLI.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Parent Order Item Id", strParentOLIId);_newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Root Order Item Id", strRootOLIId);_newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Prod Item Id", strProdItemId);_newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Product Port Id", strProductPortId);_newline bcOLI.WriteRecord();_newline }_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strRetVal = "HIE_usPOSITION_usERR";_newline }_newline bcOLI = null;_newline boOrder=null;_newline return strRetVal;_newline}

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: /*-------------+------+--------+---------------------------------------------- _newlineDate(YYYYMMDD) | Ver | By | Description of Change _newline---------------+------+--------+---------------------------------------------- _newline20140205 | 1.00 | exist| existing _newline20140221 | 1.1 | ARPAN | Incorporated System Outgoing Bar/Exit Collections Resume _newlineand System Bar removal _newline20140325 | 1.2 | ARPAN | Defect: 8722/8791 Incorporated Promise To Pay and Asset Don't bar flag issue. _newline-------------+------+--------+------------------------------------------------*/ _newline _newlinefunction func_usProcessCollectionsForBillProfile(Inputs, Outputs) _newline{ _newline var strErrCode="", strErrMesg=""; _newline var boMain,bcAsset,boEDR,bcEDR,bcAttr; _newline var strServiceId,isRec; _newline var strContactId="",strAccntId="",strAssetStatus="",strAssetId=""; _newline var strRequestType = Inputs.GetProperty("Request Type"); _newline var strExtRefIdMain = Inputs.GetProperty("Ext Ref Id"); _newline var strEDRBatchId = Inputs.GetProperty("EDRBatchId"); _newline var strEDRChildId = Inputs.GetProperty("EDRChildId"); _newline var strCIPId = Inputs.GetProperty("Bill Profile Id"); _newline var strExtRefIdChld,strChildInfo,strAssetIntegId; _newline var strChildInfo1; _newline var strChildInfoFinal; _newline var strProdType; _newline var strProdName; _newline var vLOVBO; _newline var vLOVBC; _newline var strActionCode; _newline var strParProdName; _newline var vSearchExpr; _newline var vDonotBar = ""; _newline var strOrderValid = "Y" _newline//take the bill profle from inputs _newline//check that it is postpaid (generally should be so) _newline//for all assets with the given bill profile process the record _newline//either create child EDRs for processing OR Use the grandchild name value records to store the processing details _newline//Query parent using Ext Ref Id _newline boEDR = TheApplication().GetBusObject("TM BO Bulk Job Details"); _newline bcEDR= boEDR.GetBusComp("TM Bulk Job Batch Details"); _newline bcEDR.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline bcEDR.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcEDR.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strEDRChildId + "'"); _newline bcEDR.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline var isRecord = bcEDR.FirstRecord(); _newline if(isRecord) _newline { _newline bcAttr = boEDR.GetBusComp("TM Bulk Job Batch Details Attrib"); _newline bcAttr.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline bcAttr.ActivateField("Name"); _newline bcAttr.ActivateField("Comments"); _newline bcAttr.ActivateField("Data Type"); _newline bcAttr.ActivateField("Text Value"); _newline//query all assets with matching bill profile _newline boMain = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Account");//Asset Management _newline bcAsset= boMain.GetBusComp("Asset Mgmt - Asset (Order Mgmt)");//Asset Mgmt - Asset _newline bcAsset.ActivateMultipleFields(func_usMultiFields("Asset Mgmt - Asset (Order Mgmt)")); _newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Cut Off Indicator Flag"); _newline bcAsset.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline bcAsset.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcAsset.SetSearchExpr("[Billing Profile Id]='" + strCIPId + "' AND [Parent Asset Id] IS NULL AND [Prod Type]<>'Promotion' AND [Status] <> 'Inactive'"); _newline //bcAsset.SetSearchExpr("[Billing Profile Id]='" + strCIPId + "' AND [Parent Asset Id] IS NULL"); _newline//fetch all promotions and other Root Assets which are not associated with any promotion _newline //bcAsset.SetSearchExpr("[Billing Profile Id]='" + strCIPId + "' AND [Parent Asset Id] IS NULL AND ([Prod Type]='Promotion' OR ([Prod Type]<>'Promotion' AND [Prod Prom Instance Id] IS NULL))"); _newline bcAsset.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline isRec = bcAsset.FirstRecord(); _newline while(isRec) _newline { _newline strServiceId = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Serial Number"); _newline strContactId = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Owner Contact Id"); _newline strAccntId = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Owner Account Id"); _newline strAssetStatus = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Status"); _newline strAssetId = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Id"); _newline strProdType = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Prod Type"); _newline strProdName = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Product Name"); _newline vDonotBar = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Cut Off Indicator Flag"); _newline var strComments = strAssetId +";"+ strProdName; _newline if((""!=strServiceId)) _newline { _newline if(("Y"==vDonotBar && ("Credit:Exit Collection" ==strRequestType || "Credit:Promise To Pay" ==strRequestType)) || ("Y"!=vDonotBar && ("Credit:Outgoing Bar" ==strRequestType || "Credit:Incoming Bar" ==strRequestType || "Credit:Exit Collection" ==strRequestType || "Credit:Promise To Pay" ==strRequestType))) _newline { _newline try _newline { _newline bcAttr.NewRecord(NewBefore); _newline bcAttr.SetFieldValue("Data Type", "Text"); _newline bcAttr.SetFieldValue("Text Value", strServiceId); _newline bcAttr.SetFieldValue("Comments", strComments); _newline bcAttr.SetFieldValue("Name", bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Integration Id")); _newline bcAttr.WriteRecord(); _newline } _newline catch(e) _newline { _newline strErrCode="REC_usCREATION_usERR"; _newline strErrCode=e.errCode + ":" + e.errText; _newline } _newline } _newline else _newline { _newline strErrCode= "Asset Do Not Bar flag is Active"; _newline } _newline isRec = bcAsset.NextRecord(); _newline } _newline } _newline } _newline//now process each child record _newline bcAttr.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcAttr.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline isRec = bcAttr.FirstRecord(); _newline while(isRec) _newline { _newline strAssetIntegId = bcAttr.GetFieldValue("Name"); _newline strServiceId = bcAttr.GetFieldValue("Text Value"); _newline strComments = bcAttr.GetFieldValue("Comments"); _newline strComments = strComments.split(";"); _newline strAssetId = strComments[0]; _newline strProdName = strComments[1]; _newline var Length = strExtRefIdMain.length; _newline strExtRefIdMain = strExtRefIdMain.substring(Length - 9); _newline strExtRefIdChld = strExtRefIdMain+":"+strServiceId; _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Ext Ref Id", strExtRefIdChld); _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Integration Id", strAssetIntegId); _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Account Id", strAccntId); _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Contact Id", strContactId); _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Billing Profile Id", strCIPId); _newline TheApplication().SetProfileAttr("CurrentOrderId", ""); _newline// 1.1 Below: Check for Exsiting Future Dated Order if any Cancel it _newline func_usCancelFDO(Inputs, Outputs); _newline// 1.1 Above: _newline if("Credit:Outgoing Bar" == strRequestType) _newline { _newline/* 1.1 Below: Look up for Barring products and there parent bundles,If any new product comes it should be added in below _newlineLOV with pattern like Product Name :A;B;C ,in similar way Parent Products and Action code should get added,Number of records should be same for _newlineProduct Name,Action Code and Parent product name with ; seperated values*/ _newline _newline vLOVBO = TheApplication().GetBusObject("List Of Values"); _newline vLOVBC = vLOVBO.GetBusComp("List Of Values"); _newline vLOVBC.ActivateField("Type"); _newline vLOVBC.ActivateField("Name"); _newline vLOVBC.ActivateField("Value"); _newline vLOVBC.ActivateField("High"); _newline vLOVBC.ActivateField("Low"); _newline vLOVBC.ClearToQuery(); _newline vLOVBC.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline vSearchExpr = "[Type] = 'VFQA_usBAR_usPRODUCT' AND [Name] = '"+strProdName+"' "; _newline vLOVBC.SetSearchExpr(vSearchExpr); _newline vLOVBC.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline if(vLOVBC.FirstRecord() ) _newline { _newline strProdName = vLOVBC.GetFieldValue("High"); _newline strActionCode = vLOVBC.GetFieldValue("Value"); _newline strParProdName = vLOVBC.GetFieldValue("Low"); _newline// 1.1 Below:For Credit Outgoing Bar Create Modify Order _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Product Names", strProdName); _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Action Codes", strActionCode); _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Parent Product Names", strParProdName); _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Asset Integration Id", strAssetIntegId); _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Order Validation", strOrderValid); _newline Inputs.SetProperty("ByPass Validation", "Y");//NandeeshS: Added to bypass Validation_newline func_usCreateModifyOrderGeneric(Inputs, Outputs); _newline strChildInfo = Outputs.GetProperty("Order Id")+":"+Outputs.GetProperty("Error Code")+":"+Outputs.GetProperty("Error Message"); _newline bcAttr.SetFieldValue("Comments", strChildInfo.substring(0,255)); _newline } _newline else _newline { _newline bcAttr.SetFieldValue("Comments", "Outgoing Bar not required for Promotions"); _newline } _newline } _newline// 1.1 Above _newline else if("Credit:Incoming Bar" == strRequestType)//this is Suspend _newline { _newline//Nandesh:27052014:Added Script Modify order to delete System Bar product then Suspend the order _newlineTheApplication().SetProfileAttr("CurrentOrderId", ""); _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Asset Id", strAssetId); _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Parent Product Names", strProdName); _newline //Inputs.SetProperty("StrAssetStatus", strAssetStatus);//NandeeshS Added to differntiate Asset _newline func_usCheckandRemoveBar(Inputs, Outputs); _newline strChildInfo = Outputs.GetProperty("Comment_usStatus"); _newline bcAttr.SetFieldValue("Comments", strChildInfo.substring(0,255)); _newline//Nandeesh ended _newline //TheApplication().SetProfileAttr("CurrentOrderId", ""); _newline _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Request Type", "Suspend"); _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Request Source", "System"); _newline func_usProcessSuspendResumeSub(Inputs, Outputs); _newline strChildInfo = Outputs.GetProperty("OrderId")+":"+Outputs.GetProperty("Error Code")+":"+Outputs.GetProperty("Error Message"); _newline bcAttr.SetFieldValue("Comments", strChildInfo.substring(0,255)); _newline } _newline else if("Credit:Exit Collection" == strRequestType || "Credit:Promise To Pay" == strRequestType)//this is Resume _newline { _newline//this is tricky, if asset is suspended by system resume it _newline//if asset is active (OR suspended by user) and barred by some specific system bar product, remove that bar product _newline// 1.1 Below:If Asset status is suspended create resumeorder _newline if("Suspended" == strAssetStatus) _newline { _newline _newline// 1.1 Below:For Exit collection Accounts check if there is any System Bar if present remove it _newline// [MAYANK]CHANGING THE SEQUENCE OF SUSPEND AND MODIFY , NOW MODIFY WILL BE RAISED FIRST AND THEN RESUME _newline TheApplication().SetProfileAttr("CurrentOrderId", ""); _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Asset Id", strAssetId); _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Parent Product Names", strProdName); _newline func_usCheckandRemoveBar(Inputs, Outputs); _newline strChildInfo = Outputs.GetProperty("Comment_usStatus"); _newline bcAttr.SetFieldValue("Comments", strChildInfo.substring(0,255)); _newline _newline TheApplication().SetProfileAttr("CurrentOrderId", ""); _newline _newline// 1.1 Below:For Exit collection Accounts First Create a Full Resume _newline _newline _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Request Type", "Resume"); _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Request Source", "System"); _newline func_usProcessSuspendResumeSub(Inputs, Outputs); _newline strChildInfo = Outputs.GetProperty("OrderId")+":"+Outputs.GetProperty("Error Code")+":"+Outputs.GetProperty("Error Message"); _newline //func_usCheckandRemoveBar(Inputs, Outputs); _newline _newline } _newline else _newline { _newline// 1.1 Below:If Asset is not in Suspended status craete Modify order to remove System Bar products if any present _newline TheApplication().SetProfileAttr("CurrentOrderId", ""); _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Asset Id", strAssetId); _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Parent Product Names", strProdName); _newline Inputs.SetProperty("NotAssertise", "Y");//NandeeshS Added to differntiate Asset _newline func_usCheckandRemoveBar(Inputs, Outputs); _newline strChildInfo = Outputs.GetProperty("Comment_usStatus"); _newline bcAttr.SetFieldValue("Comments", strChildInfo.substring(0,255)); _newline } _newline _newline } _newline// 1.1 Above _newline else if("Credit:Account Termination" == strRequestType) _newline { _newline// Inputs.SetProperty("Reason","Payment Failure"); _newline// func_usDisconnectOrder(Inputs, Outputs); _newline// strChildInfo = Outputs.GetProperty("OrderId")+":"+Outputs.GetProperty("Error Code")+":"+Outputs.GetProperty("Error Message"); _newline bcAttr.SetFieldValue("Comments", "TO_usBE_usPROCESSED_usMANUALLY"); _newline } _newline isRec = bcAttr.NextRecord(); _newline } _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", strErrCode); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", strErrMesg); _newline _newline strComments = null; _newline vLOVBC=null; _newline vLOVBO=null; _newline bcAsset=null; _newline boMain=null; _newline bcEDR=null; _newline boEDR=null; _newline return CancelOperation; _newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usProcessCollectionsForBillProfile

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: /*-------+------+--------+----------------------------------------------_newlineYYYYMMDD | Ver | By | Description of cleanup_newline20140214 | 1.1 | PPB | Set a dummy default bestmate when removing_newline20140217 | 1.2 | PPB | Remove the OLI if all the remaining bestmate numbers are
