from RecordId and check if it is stored as best mate on any asset as attribute, process modify orders_newline//must add index on S_usASSET_usXA.CHAR_usVAL_newline var strErrCode="OK", strErrMesg="",strErrInfo="";_newline var strTemp,arrTemp,strOrderId,strAccntId,strCIPId,strConId;_newline var bsUtil,psOp,psIp,isRec;_newline var boEDR,bcEDR,bcEDRAttr;_newline var boOrder,bcOrder,bcOLI,bcOXA;_newline var boMain,bcAsset,bcAttr;_newline var strXAId,strAssetId,strRootAssetId,strAssetIntegId,strRootAssetIntegId,recCnt=0;_newline var strEDRBatchId = Inputs.GetProperty("EDRBatchId");_newline var strEDRChildId = Inputs.GetProperty("EDRChildId");_newline var strNumber = Inputs.GetProperty("Ext Ref Id");_newline var strToBeRefId = "NPBM"+strNumber;_newline var strDummyNumber= "97499999999";_newline_newline boEDR = TheApplication().GetBusObject("TM BO Bulk Job Details");_newline bcEDR= boEDR.GetBusComp("TM Bulk Job Batch Details");_newline bcEDR.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcEDR.ClearToQuery();_newline bcEDR.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strEDRChildId + "'");_newline bcEDR.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcEDR.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline bcEDRAttr = boEDR.GetBusComp("TM Bulk Job Batch Details Attrib");_newline bcEDRAttr.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcEDRAttr.ActivateField("Name");_newline bcEDRAttr.ActivateField("Comments");_newline bcEDRAttr.ActivateField("Data Type");_newline bcEDRAttr.ActivateField("Text Value");_newline bcEDRAttr.ActivateField("Comments");_newline_newline boMain=TheApplication().GetBusObject("Account");_newline bcAttr=boMain.GetBusComp("Asset Mgmt - Asset XA");_newline bcAttr.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcAttr.ActivateField("Root Object Id");_newline bcAttr.ActivateField("Object Id");_newline bcAttr.ActivateField("Text Value");_newline bcAttr.ActivateField("Name");_newline bcAttr.ClearToQuery();_newline bcAttr.SetSearchExpr("[Name] LIKE 'My Favourite Friend*' AND [Text Value]='" + strNumber + "'");_newline bcAttr.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline isRec=bcAttr.FirstRecord();_newline while(isRec)_newline {_newline//check asset to be active_newline strXAId = bcAttr.GetFieldValue("Id");_newline strAssetId= bcAttr.GetFieldValue("Object Id");_newline strRootAssetId= bcAttr.GetFieldValue("Root Object Id");_newline_newline bcAsset=boMain.GetBusComp("Asset Mgmt - Asset (Order Mgmt)");_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Integration Id");_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Root Integration Id");_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Owner Account Id");_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Billing Profile Id");_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Owner Contact Id");_newline_newline bcAsset.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcAsset.ClearToQuery();_newline bcAsset.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strAssetId + "' AND [Status]<>'Inactive'");//can be suspended_newline bcAsset.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcAsset.FirstRecord())_newline {//create a EDR GChild record_newline recCnt++;_newline strRootAssetIntegId=bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Root Integration Id");_newline strAssetIntegId=bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Integration Id");_newline strAccntId=bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Owner Account Id");_newline strCIPId=bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Billing Profile Id");_newline strConId=bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Owner Contact Id");_newline try_newline {_newline bcEDRAttr.NewRecord(NewBefore);_newline bcEDRAttr.SetFieldValue("Data Type", "Text");_newline bcEDRAttr.SetFieldValue("Comments", "");_newline bcEDRAttr.SetFieldValue("Name", strRootAssetIntegId);_newline bcEDRAttr.SetFieldValue("Text Value","AccntId;"+strAccntId + ";RootIntId;"+strRootAssetIntegId + ";IntegId;" + strAssetIntegId);_newline bcEDRAttr.WriteRecord();_newline }_newline catch(e)_newline {//may have been already created_newline strErrInfo=e.errCode + ":" + e.errText;_newline }_newline }_newline isRec=bcAttr.NextRecord();_newline }_newline if(0==recCnt)_newline {_newline strErrMesg="Ported out number " + strNumber + " was not found on any best mate attribute.";_newline strErrCode="OK";_newline Outputs.SetProperty("DeleteEDRRecord","N");_newline }_newline else_newline {//process the child records created in previous block of code_newline psIp=TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline bsUtil=TheApplication().GetService("Workflow Process Manager");_newline_newline bcEDRAttr.ClearToQuery();_newline bcEDRAttr.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline isRec=bcEDRAttr.FirstRecord();_newline while(isRec)_newline {_newline//0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7_newline//AccntId;1-2FXQI;RootIntId;1-2GS8J;IntegId;1-A2Z1XB;OrderId;1-B46O7V_newline strTemp=bcEDRAttr.GetFieldValue("Text Value");_newline arrTemp=strTemp.split(";");_newline psIp.SetProperty("AccountId",arrTemp[1]);_newline psIp.SetProperty("AssetIntegrationId", arrTemp[3]);_newline psOp=TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline//check order_newline boOrder=TheApplication().GetBusObject("Order Entry (Sales)");_newline bcOrder=boOrder.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Orders");_newline bcOLI=boOrder.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Line Items");//My Favourite Friend Best Mate*_newline bcOXA=boOrder.GetBusComp("Order Item XA");_newline_newline bcOrder.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Back Office Order Number");_newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Billing Profile Id");_newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Contact Id");_newline// bcOrder.ActivateField("Charged Flag"); //Commented by AMITB for Paid Flag removal_newline bcOLI.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Action Code");_newline bcOXA.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcOXA.ActivateField("Text Value");_newline bcOXA.ActivateField("Previous Text Value");_newline bcOXA.ActivateField("Action Code");_newline bcOXA.ActivateField("Name");_newline_newline bcOrder.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOrder.SetSearchExpr("[Back Office Order Number]='"+ strToBeRefId + arrTemp[3] + "'");_newline bcOrder.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline_newline if(bcOrder.FirstRecord())_newline bcEDRAttr.SetFieldValue("Comments","ORDER_usALREADY_usCREATED:" + bcOrder.GetFieldValue("Id"));//already processed_newline else_newline {_newline psIp.SetProperty("ProcessName", "SISOMModifyWebService-Order");_newline bsUtil.InvokeMethod("RunProcess", psIp, psOp);_newline strOrderId=psOp.GetProperty("ActiveDocumentId");_newline bcOrder.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOrder.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='"+ strOrderId + "'");_newline bcOrder.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline_newline if(bcOrder.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline//manage the OLI_newline bcOLI.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOLI.SetSearchExpr("[Asset Integration Id]='"+arrTemp[5]+"'");//get the OLI using asset integ id, else product names can be various_newline bcOLI.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcOLI.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline bcOXA.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOXA.SetSearchExpr("[Text Value] IS NOT NULL AND [Text Value]<>'" + strNumber + "' AND [Text Value]<>'" + strDummyNumber + "'");_newline bcOXA.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcOXA.FirstRecord())_newline {//multiple non-dummy best mate other than current port-out number, set dummy to correct oli XA_newline bcOXA.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOXA.SetSearchExpr("[Text Value]='" + strNumber + "'");_newline bcOXA.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcOXA.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline bcOXA.SetFieldValue("Previous Text Value",strNumber);_newline bcOXA.SetFieldValue("Text Value", strDummyNumber);_newline bcOXA.SetFieldValue("Action Code","Update");_newline bcOXA.WriteRecord();_newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Action Code","Update");_newline bcOLI.WriteRecord();_newline }_newline }_newline else_newline {//no non-dummy best mate other than current port-out number, set delete on OLI_newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Action Code","Delete");_newline bcOLI.WriteRecord();_newline }_newline }_newline//submit the order and ignore error_newline bcEDRAttr.SetFieldValue("Text Value",strTemp + ";OrderId;" + strOrderId);_newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Billing Profile Id",strCIPId);_newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Contact Id",strConId);_newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Back Office Order Number",strToBeRefId + arrTemp[3]);_newline // bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Charged Flag","Y"); //Commented by AMITB for Paid Flag removal_newline bcOrder.WriteRecord();_newline psIp.SetProperty("Fulfillment Mode","Deliver");_newline psIp.SetProperty("RowId", strOrderId);_newline psIp.SetProperty("ProcessName", "SISOMBillingSubmitOrderWebService");_newline try_newline {_newline bsUtil.InvokeMethod("RunProcess", psIp, psOp);_newline bcEDRAttr.SetFieldValue("Comments","ORDER_usSUBMITTED");_newline }_newline catch(e)_newline {_newline strErrInfo=e.errCode + ":" + e.errText;_newline bcEDRAttr.SetFieldValue("Comments","ORDER_usSUBMIT_usERROR:"+strErrInfo.substring(0,230));_newline }_newline }_newline else_newline bcEDRAttr.SetFieldValue("Comments","MODIFY_usORDER_usERROR");_newline }_newline bcEDRAttr.WriteRecord();_newline isRec=bcEDRAttr.NextRecord();_newline }_newline strErrMesg="Ported out number " + strNumber + " found on " + recCnt + " other numbers as best mate, the association was removed.";_newline strErrCode="OK";_newline Outputs.SetProperty("DeleteEDRRecord","N");_newline }_newline }_newline bsUtil = null;_newline psOp = null;_newline psIp = null;_newline bcAttr = null;_newline bcAsset = null;_newline boMain = null;_newline bcEDRAttr=null;_newline bcEDR=null;_newline boEDR=null;_newline arrTemp=null;_newline bcOXA=null;_newline bcOLI=null;_newline bcOrder=null;_newline boOrder=null;_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code",strErrCode);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message",strErrMesg);_newline return CancelOperation;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usProcessEDR_usBestMateCleanup

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: /*-------+------+--------+----------------------------------------------_newlineYYYYMMDD | Ver | By | Description of Change_newline---------+------+--------+----------------------------------------------_newline20131112 | 1.00 | Nitesh | First version - Brought from Old stack based on decision to use AS IS design _newline20131217 | 1.01 | PPB | Seperate file loader function for BP configured_newline---------+------+--------+--------------------------------------------*/_newlinefunction func_usProcessFiles(Inputs,Outputs)_newline{_newline//the command to print the file names will be, name sorted_newline//for dos _newline//dir [directory]\[pattern] /ON /B > [directory]\filelist.txt_newline//for unix??_newline//ls [directory]/[pattern] | sort > [directory]/filelist.txt_newline//populate the filenames in a propertyset, simple to call _newline var strBatchType = Inputs.GetProperty("BatchType");_newline var strPattern = Inputs.GetProperty("FilePattern");_newline var strPath = Inputs.GetProperty("DirectoryPath");_newline var strPathResult = Inputs.GetProperty("DirectoryPathResult");_newline var strPathTarget = Inputs.GetProperty("DirectoryPathTarget");_newline var strDeleteSource = Inputs.GetProperty("DeleteSource");_newline strDeleteSource = strDeleteSource.toLowerCase();_newline var bDeleteSource = false;_newline if("true"==strDeleteSource || "y"==strDeleteSource) bDeleteSource = true;_newline var strFNameForList = strPath + "file_uslist_usto_usprocess.lst";//use some file name which is not obvious_newline var iCutLen = 1 + strPath.length;_newline//must get syspref EECC_usSIEBEL_usSERVER_usOS_newline var strCMD = "";//command string to execute list directory function on the OS_newline//TheApplication().GetSysPref("TM_usSIEBEL_usSERVER_usOS");//name of the OS, can be WIN, win, Win (Windows) or Unix, UNIX, unix (all flavours of UNIX) flavours of UNIX)_newline var strOS = "unix";_newline Outputs.SetProperty("OSName",strOS);_newline var isUnixOS = true; _newline if("unix" != strOS.toLowerCase() && "linux" != strOS.toLowerCase())_newline isUnixOS = false;_newline if(isUnixOS)//unix_newline {_newline// strCMD = "ls " + strPath + strPattern + " | cut -c " + iCutLen + "- | sort > " + strFNameForList;_newline//sort is seen to cause problems, so dropped that_newline strCMD = "ls " + strPath + strPattern + " | cut -c " + iCutLen + "- > " + strFNameForList;_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strCMD = "dir " + strPath + strPattern + " /ON /B > " + strFNameForList;_newline }_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Command",strCMD);_newline//now execute the command on OS, can be risky _newline Clib.system(strCMD);_newline//now a file got generated and that must be read to get the filenames_newline var bsFile:Service = TheApplication().GetService("EAI File Transport");_newline var psInp:PropertySet = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline var psOp:PropertySet = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline psInp.SetProperty("FileName", strFNameForList);_newline psInp.SetProperty("IsReceivingTextData", "true");_newline bsFile.InvokeMethod("Receive",psInp, psOp);_newline_newline psInp=psOp.Copy();_newline bsFile = TheApplication().GetService("Transcode Service");_newline psInp.SetProperty("SourceEncoding","UTF-8");_newline psInp.SetProperty("ConversionMode","EncodingToString");_newline bsFile.InvokeMethod("Convert",psInp, psOp);_newline_newline var strFileNameList = psOp.GetValue();//contains multiple lines with actual filenames in the directory_newline var arrFileNameList = strFileNameList.split("\n");_newline_newline psInp = null;_newline psOp = null;_newline bsFile = null;_newline_newline // Outputs.SetProperty("FileNames",strFileNameList);_newline var iCnt=0;_newline for(var i=0;i<arrFileNameList.length;i++)_newline {_newline if(""!=arrFileNameList[i])_newline {_newline Outputs.SetProperty("file" + iCnt,arrFileNameList[i]);_newline if(""!=strPathTarget)//copy / move files from current location to target location_newline {_newline strCMD = "";_newline if(bDeleteSource && isUnixOS) strCMD = "mv '" + strPath + arrFileNameList[i] + "' '" + strPathTarget + arrFileNameList[i] + "'";_newline else if(!bDeleteSource && isUnixOS) strCMD = "cp '" + strPath + arrFileNameList[i] + "' '" + strPathTarget + arrFileNameList[i] + "'";_newline else if(bDeleteSource && !isUnixOS) strCMD = "move " + strPath + arrFileNameList[i] + " " + strPathTarget + arrFileNameList[i];_newline else if(!bDeleteSource && !isUnixOS) strCMD = "copy " + strPath + arrFileNameList[i] + " " + strPathTarget + arrFileNameList[i];_newline_newline Clib.system(strCMD);_newline//load records from the file_newline var psFInp:PropertySet = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline var psFOp:PropertySet = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline psFInp.SetProperty("DirectoryPath", strPathTarget);_newline psFInp.SetProperty("BatchType", strBatchType);_newline psFInp.SetProperty("FileName", arrFileNameList[i]);_newline psFInp.SetProperty("Header Lines to Skip", 1);_newline psFInp.SetProperty("Footer Lines to Skip", 0);_newline psFInp.SetProperty("Delimiter",",");_newline_newline//[JUHIV][08.05.2012][Added for BestMate Update functionality]_newline if("Bestmate"== strBatchType)_newline {_newline func_usLoadBestmateRecords(psFInp, psFOp);_newline }_newline else if("BP"== strBatchType)_newline {_newline func_usLoadBPRecordsfromFile(psFInp, psFOp);_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline func_usLoadRecordsfromFile(psFInp, psFOp);_newline }_newline//now move the file to output folder_newline if(""!=strPathResult)_newline {_newline strCMD = "";_newline if(bDeleteSource && isUnixOS)_newline strCMD = "mv '" + strPathTarget + arrFileNameList[i] + "' '" + strPathResult + arrFileNameList[i] + "'";_newline else if(!bDeleteSource && isUnixOS)_newline strCMD = "cp '" + strPathTarget + arrFileNameList[i] + "' '" + strPathResult + arrFileNameList[i] + "'";_newline else if(bDeleteSource && !isUnixOS)_newline strCMD = "move " + strPathTarget + arrFileNameList[i] + " " + strPathResult + arrFileNameList[i];_newline else if(!bDeleteSource && !isUnixOS)_newline strCMD = "copy " + strPathTarget + arrFileNameList[i] + " " + strPathResult + arrFileNameList[i];_newline Clib.system(strCMD);_newline }_newline }_newline iCnt++;_newline }_newline }_newline Outputs.SetProperty("CountOfFiles",iCnt);_newline return CancelOperation;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usProcessFiles

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function func_usProcessPrepaidOrder(Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Account Id", "");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Contact Id", "");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Address Id", "");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Invoice Profile Id", "");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Order Id", "");_newline_newline var strErrMesg = "";_newline var strErrCode = "";_newline var strErrMesgBase = "";_newline var strBundleId = "";_newline var isRecord;_newline var bSubmit = true;_newline var strSubmit = Inputs.GetProperty("Submit Order");_newlineTheApplication().SetProfileAttr("ConVal", "N");_newline if("N" == strSubmit || "No" == strSubmit)_newline bSubmit = false;_newline var strMSISDN = Inputs.GetProperty("MSISDN");_newline//20110801:PPB SIM will come in as SIMNUM:SIMTYPE, later part can be null_newline var strSIMType = "";_newline var strSIM = "";_newline strSIMType = Inputs.GetProperty("SIM Type");_newline strSIM = Inputs.GetProperty("SIM");_newline var strPlan = Inputs.GetProperty("Plan Name");_newline var strResToken= Inputs.GetProperty("Reservation Token");_newline if("" == strSIM || "" == strMSISDN || "" == strPlan || "" == strResToken)_newline {_newline strErrCode = "INADEQUATE_usINPUTS";_newline strErrMesg = "Input arguments missing: SIM, MSISDN, Plan Name, Reservation Token";_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline var strAccntId = "";_newline var strConId = "";_newline var strAddrId = "";_newline var strInvProfId = "";_newline var strOrderId = "";_newline var strToBeAccntName = "Prepaid: " + strMSISDN + " " + strSIM;_newline var strToBeContactFN = strSIM;_newline var strToBeContactLN = strMSISDN;_newline var strToBeConDocId = strMSISDN;_newline var strToBeOrdIntId = strMSISDN;//20110909: Set the MSISDN itself_newline var strToBeStrAddr = strMSISDN;_newline var strToBeCIPName = strSIM;_newline var boAsset:BusObject = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Asset Management");_newline var bcAsset:BusComp = boAsset.GetBusComp("Asset Mgmt - Asset");_newline var boAccount:BusObject = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Account");_newline var bcAccount:BusComp = boAccount.GetBusComp("Account");_newline var bcInvProf:BusComp = boAccount.GetBusComp("Com Invoice Profile");_newline var bcOrder:BusComp = boAccount.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Orders");_newline var bcPick:BusComp;_newline bcAccount.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcInvProf.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcOrder.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcAccount.ActivateField("Name");_newline bcAccount.ActivateField("Type");_newline bcAccount.ActivateField("Primary Contact Id");_newline bcAccount.ActivateField("VFQA Notification Contact Id");//Manasi V : Added for Order Validation_newline bcAccount.ActivateField("Primary Address Id");_newline bcAccount.ActivateField("Market Class");_newline bcAccount.ActivateField("Payment Type");_newline bcAccount.ActivateField("Payment Method");_newline bcInvProf.ActivateField("Contact Id");_newline bcInvProf.ActivateField("Address Id");_newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Order Number");_newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Order Type");_newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Status");_newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Back Office Order Number");_newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Integration Id");_newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Account Id");_newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Billing Account Id");_newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Billing Profile Id");_newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Service Account Id");_newline // bcOrder.ActivateField("Sub Type");_newline var bsProdData:Service = TheApplication().GetService("PDS Product Data Service");_newline var psInp:PropertySet = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline var psOp:PropertySet = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline bcAsset.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Status");_newline bcAsset.ClearToQuery();_newline //20111024:PPB check for root active asset only_newline bcAsset.SetSearchExpr("[Parent Asset Id] IS NULL AND [Serial Number]='" + strMSISDN + "' AND [Status]='Active'");//check that an active asset does not exist._newline bcAsset.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(!bcAsset.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline //search account, if it exists then no need to query_newline bcAccount.ClearToQuery();_newline bcAccount.SetSearchExpr("[Name]='" + strToBeAccntName + "'");_newline bcAccount.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(!bcAccount.FirstRecord())//create account record_newline {_newline bcAccount.NewRecord(NewAfter);//NAME: Prepaid: 97470399466 8942702109120946152, LOC: null_newline bcAccount.SetFieldValue("Name", strToBeAccntName);_newline bcAccount.SetFieldValue("Type", "Residential");_newline bcAccount.SetFieldValue("Market Class", "Not Set");_newline // bcAccount.SetFieldValue("Payment Type", "Prepaid");_newline//bcAccount.SetFieldValue("Payment Method", "Prepaid");_newline bcAccount.WriteRecord();_newline }_newline strAccntId = bcAccount.GetFieldValue("Id");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Account Id", strAccntId);_newline //this actually needs to be created in MVBC_newline //check and associate contact record_newline var bcContactMVG:BusComp = bcAccount.GetMVGBusComp("Primary Contact First Name");_newline bcContactMVG.ClearToQuery();_newline bcContactMVG.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcContactMVG.SetSearchExpr("[ID Information]='"+ strToBeConDocId + "'");_newline bcContactMVG.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(!bcContactMVG.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline var bcContact:BusComp = bcContactMVG.GetAssocBusComp();_newline bcContact.ActivateField("Id");_newline bcContact.ActivateField("First Name");_newline bcContact.ActivateField("Last Name");_newline bcContact.ActivateField("M/F");_newline// bcContact.ActivateField("Date of Birth");_newline bcContact.ActivateField("Birth Date");_newline bcContact.SetUserProperty("AllowIdTypeDummy","Y");_newline bcContact.ActivateField("ID Type");_newline bcContact.ActivateField("ID Information");_newline bcContact.ActivateField("ID Expiration Date");_newline bcContact.ActivateField("Email Address");_newline bcContact.ActivateField("Cellular Phone #");_newline bcContact.ActivateField("HLS Citizenship"); _newline bcContact.ActivateField("Preferred Language Code");_newline bcContact.ActivateField("Preferred Communications");_newline bcContact.ActivateField("M/F");_newline bcContact.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcContact.ClearToQuery();_newline bcContact.SetSearchExpr("[ID Information]='"+ strToBeConDocId + "'");_newline bcContact.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(!bcContact.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline bcContact.NewRecord(NewAfter);_newline bcContact.SetFieldValue("First Name", strToBeContactFN);_newline bcContact.SetFieldValue("Last Name", strToBeContactLN);_newline bcContact.SetFieldValue("M/F", "M");_newline// bcContact.SetFieldValue("Date of Birth", "1/1/1970");_newline bcContact.SetFieldValue("Birth Date", "1/1/1970");_newline bcContact.SetFieldValue("ID Type", "Passport");//new type introduced for special permissions only : Qatari ID_newline bcContact.SetFieldValue("ID Information", strToBeConDocId);_newline bcContact.SetFieldValue("ID Expiration Date", "1/1/2022");_newline bcContact.SetFieldValue("Email Address", "a@b.com");_newline bcContact.SetFieldValue("Cellular Phone #", strMSISDN);_newline bcContact.SetFieldValue("HLS Citizenship", "Not Set");_newline bcContact.SetFieldValue("Preferred Language Code", "English");_newline bcContact.SetFieldValue("Preferred Communications", "Phone");//Manasi V : Added for DVM_newline bcContact.SetFieldValue("M/F", "M");_newline bcContact.WriteRecord();_newline }_newline bcContact.Associate(NewBefore);_newline strConId = bcContact.GetFieldValue("Id");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Contact Id",strConId);_newline bcContact = null;_newline }_newlineelse_newline {_newline strConId = bcContactMVG.GetFieldValue("Id");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Contact Id",strConId);_newline }_newline bcContactMVG = null;_newline//check and create address record_newline var bcAddrMVG:BusComp = bcAccount.GetMVGBusComp("Street Address");_newline bcAddrMVG.ClearToQuery();_newline bcAddrMVG.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcAddrMVG.SetSearchExpr("[Street Address]='"+ strToBeStrAddr + "'");_newline bcAddrMVG.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(!bcAddrMVG.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline var bcAddress:BusComp = bcAddrMVG.GetAssocBusComp();_newline bcAddress.ActivateField("Id");_newline bcAddress.ActivateField("Street Address");_newline bcAddress.ActivateField("VFQA PO Box");_newline bcAddress.ActivateField("Postal Code");_newline bcAddress.ActivateField("Country");_newline bcAddress.ActivateField("City");_newline bcAddress.ActivateField("State");_newline bcAddress.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcAddress.ClearToQuery();_newline bcAddress.SetSearchExpr("[Street Address]='"+ strToBeStrAddr + "'");_newline bcAddress.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(!bcAddress.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline bcAddress.NewRecord(NewAfter);_newline bcAddress.SetFieldValue("Street Address", strToBeStrAddr);_newline bcAddress.SetFieldValue("VFQA PO Box", strMSISDN.substring(5));//Prepaid: 97450000002 8943333222211110000_newline bcAddress.SetFieldValue("Postal Code", "111");_newline bcAddress.SetFieldValue("City", "Doha");_newline bcAddress.SetFieldValue("State", "AK");_newline bcAddress.SetFieldValue("Country", "Qatar");_newline bcAddress.WriteRecord();_newline }_newline bcAddress.Associate(NewBefore);_newline strAddrId = bcAddress.GetFieldValue("Id");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Address Id",strAddrId);_newline bcAddress = null;_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strAddrId = bcAddrMVG.GetFieldValue("Id");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Address Id",strAddrId);_newline }_newline bcAddrMVG=null;_newline//check create invoice profile record_newline bcInvProf.ActivateField("VFQA Notification Con Id");_newline bcInvProf.ClearToQuery();_newline bcInvProf.SetSearchExpr("[Name]='" + strToBeCIPName + "'");_newline bcInvProf.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(!bcInvProf.FirstRecord())////create CIP record_newline {_newline bcInvProf.NewRecord(NewAfter);_newline bcInvProf.SetFieldValue("Name", strToBeCIPName);_newline bcInvProf.SetFieldValue("Payment Type", "Prepaid");_newline bcInvProf.SetFieldValue("Payment Method", "Prepaid");_newline bcInvProf.SetFieldValue("VFQA Notification Con Id", strConId);_newline bcInvProf.SetFieldValue("Contact Id", strConId);_newline bcInvProf.SetFieldValue("Address Id", strAddrId);_newline bcInvProf.WriteRecord();_newline }_newline strInvProfId = bcInvProf.GetFieldValue("Id");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Invoice Profile Id",strInvProfId);_newline//set Id of all these child entities on the account as primary_newline bcAccount.SetFieldValue("Primary Contact Id", strConId);_newline bcAccount.SetFieldValue("VFQA Notification Contact Id", strConId);_newline bcAccount.SetFieldValue("Primary Address Id", strAddrId);_newline bcAccount.SetFieldValue("Primary Billing Profile Id", strInvProfId);_newline bcAccount.WriteRecord();_newline//check create order record_newline bcOrder.ClearToQuery();_newline//check for any kind of order, even if one order exists means the account has been operational_newline bcOrder.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(!bcOrder.FirstRecord())//create order_newline {_newline bcOrder.NewRecord(NewAfter);_newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Status","Paid");_newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Back Office Order Number", strToBeOrdIntId);_newline bcPick = bcOrder.GetPicklistBusComp("Order Type");_newline bcPick.ClearToQuery();_newline bcPick.SetSearchExpr("[Order Type]='Sales Order'");_newline bcPick.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcPick.FirstRecord())_newline bcPick.Pick();_newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Account Id", strAccntId);_newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Billing Account Id", strAccntId);_newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Service Account Id", strAccntId);_newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Billing Profile Id", strInvProfId);_newline bcOrder.WriteRecord();_newline strOrderId = bcOrder.GetFieldValue("Id");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Order Number", bcOrder.GetFieldValue("Order Number"));_newline bcOrder.InvokeMethod("RefreshRecord");_newline var boOrder:BusObject = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Order Entry (Sales)");_newline bcOrder = boOrder.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Orders");_newline bcOrder.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcOrder.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOrder.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strOrderId + "'");_newline bcOrder.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcOrder.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline var bcOLI:BusComp = boOrder.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Line Items (Simple)");_newline bcOLI.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Service Id");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Service Account Id");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Previous Billing Account Id");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Previous Billing Profile Id");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Previous Service Account Id");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Billing Account Id");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Billing Profile Id");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Service Account Id");_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Owner Accnt Id");_newline bcOLI.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOLI.SetSearchExpr("[Order Header Id]='" + strOrderId + "' AND [Parent Order Item Id] IS NULL");_newline bcOLI.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(!bcOLI.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline psInp.SetProperty("Doc Id", strOrderId);_newline psInp.SetProperty("Template Search Spec","[Name]='" + strPlan + "'");_newline try_newline {//this BS gives strange error where actually it adds the OLI correctly._newline bsProdData.InvokeMethod("AddFavoriteToOrder",psInp, psOp);_newline }_newline catch (e)_newline {_newline }_newline }_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Product Type");_newline bcOLI.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcOLI.InvokeMethod("SetAdminMode","TRUE");_newline bcOLI.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOLI.SetSearchExpr("[Order Header Id]='" + strOrderId + "'");_newline bcOLI.ExecuteQuery();_newline var isRecord = bcOLI.FirstRecord();_newline while(isRecord)_newline {_newline if(bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Product Type") != "Promotion")_newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Service Id",strMSISDN);_newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Service Account Id", strAccntId);_newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Previous Billing Account Id", strAccntId);_newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Previous Service Account Id", strAccntId);_newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Previous Billing Profile Id", strInvProfId);_newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Billing Account Id", strAccntId);_newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Service Account Id", strAccntId);_newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Billing Profile Id", strInvProfId);_newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Owner Accnt Id", strAccntId);_newline bcOLI.WriteRecord();_newline isRecord = bcOLI.NextRecord();_newline }_newline bcOLI.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOLI.SetSearchExpr("[Product]='Mobile Service Bundle'");_newline bcOLI.ExecuteQuery();_newline var isRecord = bcOLI.FirstRecord();_newline if(isRecord)_newline {_newline strBundleId = bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Id");_newline var bcXA=boOrder.GetBusComp("Order Item XA (Simple)");_newline bcXA.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcXA.InvokeMethod("SetAdminMode","TRUE");_newline bcXA.ClearToQuery();_newline bcXA.ActivateField("Text Value");_newline bcXA.SetSearchExpr("[Name]='Number Reservation Token' AND [Object Id] = '" + strBundleId + "'");_newline bcXA.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcXA.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline bcXA.SetFieldValue("Text Value",strResToken);_newline bcXA.SetFieldValue("Numeric Value",strResToken);_newline bcXA.WriteRecord();_newline }_newline }_newline bcOLI.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOLI.SetSearchExpr("[Product]='SIM Card'");_newline bcOLI.ExecuteQuery();_newline if(bcOLI.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Service Id", strSIM);_newline bcOLI.WriteRecord();_newline }_newline if(bSubmit)_newline {_newline bcOrder.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOrder.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strOrderId + "'");_newline bcOrder.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcOrder.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Status", "Pending");_newline bcOrder.WriteRecord();_newline bsProdData = TheApplication().GetService("Workflow Process Manager");_newline psInp.SetProperty("RowId", strOrderId); psInp.SetProperty("Fulfillment Mode", "Deliver");_newline psInp.SetProperty("RenewLock", "N");_newline psInp.SetProperty("ProcessName", "SISOMBillingSubmitOrderWebService");_newline bsProdData.InvokeMethod("RunProcess", psInp, psOp);_newline strErrCode = "OK";_newline strErrMesg = "Order submitted.";_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strErrCode = "ORDER_usNOT_usFOUND";_newline strErrMesg = "Order was created/queried but was not found.";_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strOrderId = bcOrder.GetFieldValue("Id");_newline strErrCode = "ORDER_usEXISTS";_newline strErrMesg = "Order exists, nothing processed, may require resubmission.";_newline }_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strErrCode = "ASSET_usEXISTS";_newline strErrMesg = "An Active asset exists for the MSISDN.";_newline }_newline bsProdData = null;_newline psInp = null;_newline psOp = null;_newline bcInvProf = null;_newline bcPick = null;_newline bcOLI = null;_newline bcOrder = null;_newline bcAccount = null;_newline boAccount = null;_newline bcAsset = null;_newline boAsset = null;_newlineTheApplication().SetProfileAttr("ConVal", "");_newline strErrMesgBase = "Account:" + strAccntId + ";Contact:" + strConId + ";Address:" + strAddrId + ";InvProfile:" + strInvProfId + ";Order:" + strOrderId + ";";_newline }_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Order Id", strOrderId);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", strErrCode);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", strErrMesgBase + strErrMesg);_newline return CancelOperation;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usProcessPrepaidOrder

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: /*----------+--------------+------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- _newline| Date + By | Version | Comments _newline|-----------+--------------+------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- _newline| 20110726 + PPB TECHM + 1.0 + First release, this function takes in SIM/MSISDN and Reservation Token and prepares a prepaid starter pack order and submits it _newline| 20110730 + PPB TECHM + 1.1 + Explicit setting of Contact Id and Address Id on invoice profile BC _newline| 20110801 + PPB TECHM + 1.2 + Setting of SIM type (based on the SIM profile in BRM) in the SIM Card line item _newline|-----------+--------------+------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- _newline*/ _newlinefunction func_usProcessPrepaidOrder_uspreAvatar(Inputs, Outputs) _newline{ _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Account Id", ""); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Contact Id", ""); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Address Id", ""); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Invoice Profile Id", ""); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Order Id", ""); _newline _newline var strErrMesg = ""; _newline var strErrCode = ""; _newline var strErrMesgBase = ""; _newline var isRecord; _newline var bSubmit = true; _newline var strSubmit = Inputs.GetProperty("Submit Order"); _newline if("N" == strSubmit || "No" == strSubmit) _newline bSubmit = false; _newline var strMSISDN = Inputs.GetProperty("MSISDN"); _newline//20110801:PPB SIM will come in as SIMNUM:SIMTYPE, later part can be null _newline _newline var strSIMType = ""; _newline var strSIM = ""; _newline//if concat values in the style of EAI Queue _newline/* _newline var strSIMTEXT = Inputs.GetProperty("SIM"); _newline var arrSIMTEXT = strSIMTEXT.split(":");//must have at least some not-null text _newline _newline strSIM = arrSIMTEXT[0]; _newline if(1 < arrSIMTEXT.length)//has 2 parts _newline strSIMType = arrSIMTEXT[1]; _newline if("Vodafone Money Transfer" == strSIMType || "VMT" == strSIMType)//multiple options for VMT sim _newline strSIMType = "VMT"; _newline else _newline strSIMType = ""; _newline*/ _newline//if directly fed as values of SIM and SIM Type input properties separately _newline strSIMType = Inputs.GetProperty("SIM Type"); _newline strSIM = Inputs.GetProperty("SIM"); _newline _newline var strPlan = Inputs.GetProperty("Plan Name"); _newline var strResToken= Inputs.GetProperty("Reservation Token"); _newline _newline if("" == strSIM || "" == strMSISDN || "" == strPlan || "" == strResToken) _newline { _newline strErrCode = "INADEQUATE_usINPUTS"; _newline strErrMesg = "Input arguments must be provided: SIM, MSISDN, Plan Name, Reservation Token"; _newline } _newline else _newline { _newline var strAccntId = ""; _newline var strConId = ""; _newline var strAddrId = ""; _newline var strInvProfId = ""; _newline var strOrderId = ""; _newline _newline var strToBeAccntName = "Prepaid: " + strMSISDN + " " + strSIM; _newline var strToBeContactFN = strSIM; _newline var strToBeContactLN = strMSISDN; _newline var strToBeConDocId = strMSISDN; _newline var strToBeOrdIntId = strMSISDN;//20110909: Set the MSISDN itself _newline var strToBeStrAddr = strMSISDN; _newline var strToBeCIPName = strSIM; _newline _newline var boAsset:BusObject = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Asset Management"); _newline var bcAsset:BusComp = boAsset.GetBusComp("Asset Mgmt - Asset"); _newline _newline var boAccount:BusObject = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Account"); _newline var bcAccount:BusComp = boAccount.GetBusComp("Account"); _newline var bcInvProf:BusComp = boAccount.GetBusComp("Com Invoice Profile"); _newline var bcOrder:BusComp = boAccount.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Orders"); _newline var bcOLI:BusComp = boAccount.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Line Items"); _newline var bcPick:BusComp; _newline _newline bcAccount.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline bcInvProf.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline bcOrder.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline bcOLI.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline _newline bcAccount.ActivateField("Name"); _newline bcAccount.ActivateField("Type"); _newline bcAccount.ActivateField("Primary Contact Id"); _newline bcAccount.ActivateField("Primary Address Id"); _newline _newline bcInvProf.ActivateField("VFQ Validated Flag"); _newline bcInvProf.ActivateField("Contact Id"); _newline bcInvProf.ActivateField("Address Id"); _newline _newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Order Number"); _newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Order Type"); _newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Status"); _newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Back Office Order Number"); _newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Integration Id"); _newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Account Id"); _newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Billing Account Id"); _newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Billing Profile Id"); _newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Service Account Id"); _newline bcOrder.ActivateField("Sub Type"); _newline _newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Service Id"); _newline bcOLI.ActivateField("VFQ Product SubType"); _newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Service Account Id"); _newline _newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Previous Billing Account Id"); _newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Previous Billing Profile Id"); _newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Previous Service Account Id"); _newline _newline _newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Billing Account Id"); _newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Billing Profile Id"); _newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Service Account Id"); _newline _newline var bsProdData:Service = TheApplication().GetService("PDS Product Data Service"); _newline var psInp:PropertySet = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline var psOp:PropertySet = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline _newline bcAsset.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline bcAsset.ActivateField("Status"); _newline bcAsset.ClearToQuery(); _newline//20111024:PPB check for root active asset only _newline bcAsset.SetSearchExpr("[Parent Asset Id] IS NULL AND [Serial Number]='" + strMSISDN + "' AND [Status]='Active'");//check that an active asset does not exist. _newline bcAsset.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline if(!bcAsset.FirstRecord()) _newline { _newline//search account, if it exists then no need to query _newline bcAccount.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcAccount.SetSearchExpr("[Name]='" + strToBeAccntName + "'"); _newline bcAccount.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline if(!bcAccount.FirstRecord())//create account record _newline { _newline bcAccount.NewRecord(NewAfter);//NAME: Prepaid: 97470399466 8942702109120946152, LOC: null _newline bcAccount.SetFieldValue("Name", strToBeAccntName); _newline bcAccount.SetFieldValue("Type", "Residential"); _newline bcAccount.WriteRecord(); _newline } _newline strAccntId = bcAccount.GetFieldValue("Id"); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Account Id", strAccntId); _newline//this actually needs to be created in MVBC _newline//check and associate contact record _newline var bcContactMVG:BusComp = bcAccount.GetMVGBusComp("Primary Contact First Name"); _newline bcContactMVG.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcContactMVG.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline bcContactMVG.SetSearchExpr("[ID Information]='"+ strToBeConDocId + "'"); _newline bcContactMVG.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline if(!bcContactMVG.FirstRecord()) _newline { _newline var bcContact:BusComp = bcContactMVG.GetAssocBusComp(); _newline bcContact.ActivateField("Id"); _newline bcContact.ActivateField("First Name"); _newline bcContact.ActivateField("Last Name"); _newline bcContact.ActivateField("M/F"); _newline bcContact.ActivateField("Date of Birth"); _newline bcContact.ActivateField("ID Type"); _newline bcContact.ActivateField("ID Information"); _newline bcContact.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline bcContact.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcContact.SetSearchExpr("[ID Information]='"+ strToBeConDocId + "'"); _newline bcContact.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline if(!bcContact.FirstRecord()) _newline { _newline bcContact.NewRecord(NewAfter); _newline bcContact.SetFieldValue("First Name", strToBeContactFN); _newline bcContact.SetFieldValue("Last Name", strToBeContactLN); _newline bcContact.SetFieldValue("M/F", "M"); _newline bcContact.SetFieldValue("Date of Birth", "1/1/2000"); _newline bcContact.SetFieldValue("ID Type", "Qatari ID"); _newline bcContact.SetFieldValue("ID Information", strToBeConDocId); _newline bcContact.WriteRecord(); _newline } _newline strConId = bcContact.GetFieldValue("Id"); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Contact Id",strConId); _newline bcContact = null; _newline } _newline bcContactMVG = null; _newline//check and create address record _newline var bcAddrMVG:BusComp = bcAccount.GetMVGBusComp("Street Address"); _newline bcAddrMVG.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcAddrMVG.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline bcAddrMVG.SetSearchExpr("[Street Address]='"+ strToBeStrAddr + "'"); _newline bcAddrMVG.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline if(!bcAddrMVG.FirstRecord()) _newline { _newline var bcAddress:BusComp = bcAddrMVG.GetAssocBusComp(); _newline bcAddress.ActivateField("Id"); _newline bcAddress.ActivateField("Street Address"); _newline bcAddress.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline bcAddress.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcAddress.SetSearchExpr("[Street Address]='"+ strToBeStrAddr + "'"); _newline bcAddress.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline if(!bcAddress.FirstRecord()) _newline { _newline bcAddress.NewRecord(NewAfter); _newline bcAddress.SetFieldValue("Street Address", strToBeStrAddr); _newline bcAddress.WriteRecord(); _newline } _newline bcAddress.Associate(NewBefore); _newline strAddrId = bcAddress.GetFieldValue("Id"); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Address Id",strAddrId); _newline bcAddress = null; _newline } _newline bcAddrMVG=null; _newline//check create invoice profile record _newline bcInvProf.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcInvProf.SetSearchExpr("[Name]='" + strToBeCIPName + "'"); _newline bcInvProf.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline if(!bcInvProf.FirstRecord())////create CIP record _newline { _newline bcInvProf.NewRecord(NewAfter); _newline bcInvProf.SetFieldValue("Name", strToBeCIPName); _newline bcInvProf.SetFieldValue("Payment Method", "Prepaid"); _newline bcInvProf.SetFieldValue("VFQ Validated Flag", "Y"); _newline bcInvProf.SetFieldValue("Contact Id", strConId); _newline bcInvProf.SetFieldValue("Address Id", strAddrId); _newline bcInvProf.WriteRecord(); _newline } _newline strInvProfId = bcInvProf.GetFieldValue("Id"); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Invoice Profile Id",strInvProfId); _newline//set Id of all these child entities on the account as primary _newline bcAccount.SetFieldValue("Primary Contact Id", strConId); _newline bcAccount.SetFieldValue("Primary Address Id", strAddrId); _newline bcAccount.SetFieldValue("Primary Billing Profile Id", strInvProfId); _newline bcAccount.WriteRecord(); _newline//check create order record _newline bcOrder.ClearToQuery(); _newline//check for any kind of order, even if one order exists means the account has been operational _newline bcOrder.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline if(!bcOrder.FirstRecord())//create order _newline { _newline bcOrder.NewRecord(NewAfter); _newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Status","Paid"); _newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Back Office Order Number", strToBeOrdIntId); _newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Sub Type", "Bulk Preactivation"); _newline _newline bcPick = bcOrder.GetPicklistBusComp("Order Type"); _newline bcPick.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcPick.SetSearchExpr("[Order Type]='Sales Order'"); _newline bcPick.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline if(bcPick.FirstRecord()) _newline bcPick.Pick(); _newline _newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Account Id", strAccntId); _newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Billing Account Id", strAccntId); _newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Service Account Id", strAccntId); _newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Billing Profile Id", strInvProfId); _newline _newline bcOrder.WriteRecord();//becos there is a state model must abide by the same _newline strOrderId = bcOrder.GetFieldValue("Id"); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Order Number", bcOrder.GetFieldValue("Order Number")); _newline//check if any root OLI exists _newline bcOLI.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcOLI.SetSearchExpr("[Order Header Id]='" + strOrderId + "' AND [Parent Order Item Id] IS NULL"); _newline bcOLI.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline if(!bcOLI.FirstRecord())//create order _newline { _newline//create OLI using favourite _newline psInp.SetProperty("Doc Id", strOrderId); _newline psInp.SetProperty("Template Search Spec","[Name]='" + strPlan + "'"); _newline bsProdData.InvokeMethod("AddFavoriteToOrder",psInp, psOp); _newline } _newline//set values of SIM, MSISDN and Reservation Token on respective OLI records _newline//MSISDN _newline bcOLI.ClearToQuery(); _newline// bcOLI.SetSearchExpr("[Parent Order Item Id] IS NULL"); _newline bcOLI.SetSearchExpr("[Order Header Id]='" + strOrderId + "'"); _newline bcOLI.ExecuteQuery(); _newline var isRecord = bcOLI.FirstRecord(); _newline while(isRecord) _newline { _newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Service Id", strMSISDN); _newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Service Account Id", strAccntId); _newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Previous Billing Account Id", strAccntId); _newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Previous Service Account Id", strAccntId); _newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Previous Billing Profile Id", strInvProfId); _newline _newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Billing Account Id", strAccntId); _newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Service Account Id", strAccntId); _newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Billing Profile Id", strInvProfId); _newline _newline bcOLI.WriteRecord(); _newline isRecord = bcOLI.NextRecord(); _newline } _newline//SIM _newline bcOLI.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcOLI.SetSearchExpr("[Order Header Id]='" + strOrderId + "' AND [Product]='SIM Card'"); _newline bcOLI.ExecuteQuery(); _newline if(bcOLI.FirstRecord()) _newline { _newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Service Id", strSIM); _newline//20110801:PPB SIM Type is to be set on SIM card product _newline if(""!=strSIMType) _newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("VFQ Product SubType",strSIMType); _newline bcOLI.WriteRecord(); _newline } _newline//Reservation Token _newline bcOLI.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcOLI.SetSearchExpr("[Order Header Id]='" + strOrderId + "' AND [Product]='Number Reservation Token'"); _newline bcOLI.ExecuteQuery(); _newline if(bcOLI.FirstRecord()) _newline { _newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Service Id",strResToken); _newline bcOLI.WriteRecord(); _newline } _newline if(bSubmit) _newline { _newline//requery order _newline bcOrder.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcOrder.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strOrderId + "'"); _newline bcOrder.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline if(bcOrder.FirstRecord()) _newline { _newline//submit _newline bcOrder.SetFieldValue("Status", "Submitted"); _newline bcOrder.WriteRecord(); _newline bsProdData = TheApplication().GetService("Workflow Process Manager"); _newline psInp.SetProperty("RowId", strOrderId); _newline psInp.SetProperty("ProcessName", "SISOMBillingSubmitOrderWebService"); _newline bsProdData.InvokeMethod("RunProcess", psInp, psOp); _newline strErrCode = "OK"; _newline strErrMesg = "Order submitted."; _newline } _newline else _newline { _newline strErrCode = "ORDER_usNOT_usFOUND"; _newline strErrMesg = "Order was created/queried but was not found for submission."; _newline } _newline } _newline } _newline else _newline { _newline strOrderId = bcOrder.GetFieldValue("Id"); _newline strErrCode = "ORDER_usEXISTS"; _newline strErrMesg = "Order exists, nothing processed, may require resubmission."; _newline } _newline } _newline else _newline { _newline strErrCode = "ASSET_usEXISTS"; _newline strErrMesg = "An Active asset exists for the MSISDN."; _newline } _newline//cleanup _newline bsProdData = null; _newline psInp = null; _newline psOp = null; _newline _newline bcInvProf = null; _newline bcPick = null; _newline bcOLI = null; _newline bcOrder = null; _newline bcAccount = null; _newline boAccount = null; _newline _newline bcAsset = null; _newline boAsset = null; _newline strErrMesgBase = "Account:" + strAccntId + ";Contact:" + strConId + ";Address:" + strAddrId + ";InvProfile:" + strInvProfId + ";Order:" + strOrderId + ";"; _newline } _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Order Id", strOrderId); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", strErrCode); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", strErrMesgBase + strErrMesg); _newline return CancelOperation; _newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usProcessPrepaidOrder_uspreAvatar

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function func_usProcessSuspendResume(Inputs, Outputs)_newline{//this is typically for invocation from the UI planned to be previously by a Ticket scenario but NOT IN USE_newline var strAssetId = Inputs.GetProperty("Asset Id");_newline var strAssetIntegId = Inputs.GetProperty("Integration Id");_newline var strAccntId = Inputs.GetProperty("Account Id");//fetched from Service Account Id on asset_newline var strProdId = Inputs.GetProperty("Product Id");//product Id for the asset_newline var strReqSrc = Inputs.GetProperty("Request Source");//User, System_newline var strReqType = Inputs.GetProperty("Request Type");//suspend, resume_newline var strSRId, boMain, bcSR, bcAsset;_newline var strErrCode="OK", strErrMesg, strConId, strCIPId, strOpStatus, strStatus, strProdType,strProdName;_newline//for user initiated suspend - resume create a SR and take the user to the SR where he can set the suspend and resume dates and then submit SR_newline if("user"==strReqSrc || "User"==strReqSrc)_newline {_newline boMain = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Asset Management");_newline bcAsset = boMain.GetBusComp("Asset Mgmt - Asset");_newline bcAsset.ActivateMultipleFields(func_usMultiFields("Asset Mgmt - Asset"));_newline bcAsset.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcAsset.ClearToQuery();_newline//we consider non-Inactive, non-promotion root assets _newline bcAsset.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strAssetId + "'");_newline bcAsset.ExecuteQuery();_newline if(!bcAsset.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline strErrCode = "ASSET_usNOT_usFOUND";_newline strErrMesg = "Asset with id " + strAssetId + " not found.";_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strProdName = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Product Name");_newline strProdType = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Product Type");//PROD_usCD: promotion or not_newline strOpStatus = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Operating Status");_newline strStatus = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Status");_newline strConId = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Owner Contact Id");_newline strCIPId = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Billing Profile Id");_newline//this is system barring being requested, not allowed if already applied_newline if("Inactive"==strStatus || "Promotion"==strProdType || ""!=bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Parent Asset Id"))_newline {_newline strErrCode = "CANNOT_usEXECUTE";_newline strErrMesg = "Request to " + strReqType + " not allowed for selected asset because it is eiether a Promotion asset or already terminated or is not a root bundle asset.";_newline }_newline else if("Suspend" == strReqType && "Suspended"==strStatus && ("User"==strOpStatus || "User+System"==strOpStatus))_newline {_newline strErrCode = "ALREADY_usSUSP_usBY_usUSER";_newline strErrMesg = "Asset is already suspended upon user request.";_newline }_newline else if("Resume" == strReqType && ("Active"==strStatus || "System"==strOpStatus))_newline {_newline strErrCode = "RESUME_usNOT_usPERMITTED";_newline strErrMesg = "Asset is either Active already or not suspended by user.";_newline }_newline }_newline if("OK"==strErrCode)_newline {_newline//create ticket and navigate to the view _newline Inputs.SetProperty("TicketScenario", "SUSPEND_usRESUME");_newline func_usCreateTicket(Inputs, Outputs);_newline strSRId = Outputs.GetProperty("SR Id");_newline if(""!=strSRId)_newline {//gotoview_newline boMain = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Service Request");_newline bcSR = boMain.GetBusComp("Service Request");_newline bcSR.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcSR.ClearToQuery();_newline bcSR.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strSRId + "'");_newline bcSR.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcSR.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline TheApplication().GotoView("TM SR More Info View", boMain);_newline//would have been nice to show a message to user after navigating to the SR, but that seems to not work._newline// strErrCode = "NEXT_usSTEPS";_newline// strErrMesg = "Request has been created, please capture the relevant details and submit the request.";_newline }_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline strErrCode = "ERR_usTT_usCREATION";_newline strErrMesg = "Ticket record for requested operation could not be created.";_newline }_newline }_newline if("OK"!=strErrCode)_newline {_newline TheApplication().RaiseErrorText(strErrCode + ":" + strErrMesg);_newline }_newline }_newline return CancelOperation;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usProcessSuspendResume

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: /*-------------+------+--------+---------------------------------------------- _newlineDate(YYYYMMDD) | Ver | By | Description of Change _newline---------------+------+--------+---------------------------------------------- _newline20131212 | 1.00 | Prasad | Creation _newline20140224 | 1.10 | Arpan | Missed out nextrecord in while loop added _newline20140225 | 1.20 | Prasad | Set the paid flag and fullfillment mode before submission _newline---------------+------+--------+--------------------------------------------*/ _newlinefunction func_usProcessSuspendResumeSub(Inputs, Outputs) _newline{ _newline var strAssetIntegId = Inputs.GetProperty("Integration Id"); _newline var strRequestType = Inputs.GetProperty("Request Type"); _newline var strRequestSrc = Inputs.GetProperty("Request Source"); _newline var OrderExtRef = Inputs.GetProperty("Ext Ref Id"); _newline _newline var boMain,bcAsset; _newline var strOpStatus, strStatus, strAccntId, strRootAccId, strRootAssetId, strConId, strCIPId, strParAssetId, strProdType; _newline _newline var psIp, psOp, bsUtil, boMain, bcOrd, bcOLI; _newline var isRec,isOrderForInternalCompletion=false,isChargeApplicable=true; _newline var strOrderId="",strOLIProdName="", strOLIActionCode="",strCurrAssetStatus=""; _newline var strChangeReason= strRequestSrc + " Initiated"; _newline _newline var strErrCode="", strErrMesg=""; _newline boMain = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Asset Management"); _newline bcAsset = boMain.GetBusComp("Asset Mgmt - Asset"); _newline bcAsset.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline bcAsset.ActivateMultipleFields(func_usMultiFields("Asset Mgmt - Asset")); _newline bcAsset.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcAsset.SetSearchExpr("[Integration Id]='" + strAssetIntegId + "'"); _newline bcAsset.ExecuteQuery(); _newline if(!bcAsset.FirstRecord()) _newline { _newline strErrCode = "ASSET_usNOT_usFOUND"; _newline strErrMesg = "Suspended asset with integration id " + strAssetIntegId + " not found."; // [JUHIV][16032014][Changed strMSISDN to strAssetIntegId] _newline } _newline else _newline { _newline strParAssetId = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Parent Asset Id"); _newline strProdType = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Product Type"); _newline strProdType = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Prod Type");//this is based on S_usPROD_usINT.TYPE _newline strOpStatus = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Operating Status"); _newline strStatus = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Status"); _newline strAccntId = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Owner Account Id"); _newline strRootAccId = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Root Account Id"); _newline strRootAssetId = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Id"); _newline strAssetIntegId= bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Integration Id"); _newline strConId = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Owner Contact Id"); _newline strCIPId = bcAsset.GetFieldValue("Billing Profile Id"); _newline//check validity of requested operation _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Operating Status",strOpStatus); _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Asset Status", strStatus); _newline Inputs.SetProperty("Product Type", strProdType); _newline func_usValidateSuspendResume(Inputs, Outputs) _newline strErrCode = Outputs.GetProperty("Error Code"); _newline strErrMesg = Outputs.GetProperty("Error Message"); _newline if("OK"==strErrCode) _newline { _newline psIp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline if("Suspend"==strRequestType) _newline psIp.SetProperty("ProcessName", "SISOMSuspendWebService-Order"); _newline else if("Resume"==strRequestType) _newline psIp.SetProperty("ProcessName", "SISOMResumeWebService-Order"); _newline psIp.SetProperty("AssetIntegrationId", strAssetIntegId); _newline psIp.SetProperty("AccountId",strAccntId); _newline bsUtil = TheApplication().GetService("Workflow Process Manager"); _newline psOp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline bsUtil.InvokeMethod("RunProcess", psIp, psOp); _newline strOrderId=psOp.GetProperty("ActiveDocumentId"); _newline if(""!=strOrderId) _newline { _newline boMain = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Order Entry (Sales)"); _newline bcOrd = boMain.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Orders"); _newline bcOrd.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline// bcOrd.ActivateField("Charged Flag");//1.2 //Commented by AMITB for paid flag removal _newline bcOrd.ActivateMultipleFields(func_usMultiFields("Order Entry - Orders")); _newline bcOrd.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcOrd.SetSearchExpr("Id='" + strOrderId + "'"); _newline bcOrd.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline if(bcOrd.FirstRecord()) _newline { _newline bcOrd.SetFieldValue("Back Office Order Number", OrderExtRef); _newline bcOrd.SetFieldValue("Contact Id", strConId); _newline bcOrd.SetFieldValue("Billing Profile Id", strCIPId); _newline //bcOrd.SetFieldValue("Charged Flag","Y");//1.2 //Commented by AMITB for paid flag removal _newline bcOrd.WriteRecord(); _newline bcOLI=boMain.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Line Items"); _newline bcOLI.ActivateMultipleFields(func_usMultiFields("Order Entry - Line Items")); _newline bcOLI.SetViewMode(AllView); _newline bcOLI.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcOLI.SetSearchExpr("[Parent Order Item Id] IS NULL");//traverse root OLI To set dates and delete susp charge for system orders _newline bcOLI.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline isRec=bcOLI.FirstRecord(); _newline while(isRec) _newline { _newline strOLIProdName = bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Product"); _newline strOLIActionCode = bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Action Code"); _newline if("System" == strRequestSrc && "Resume" == strRequestType && "Add" == strOLIActionCode _newline && (-1 != strOLIProdName.indexOf("Fee") || -1 != strOLIProdName.indexOf("Charge"))) _newline { _newline isChargeApplicable=false; _newline bcOLI.DeleteRecord();//for system initiated suspension no charges to be applied _newline } _newline else if("User" == strRequestSrc && "Resume" == strRequestType && "Add" == strOLIActionCode _newline && (-1 != strOLIProdName.indexOf("Fee") || -1 != strOLIProdName.indexOf("Charge"))) _newline { //MV-01072014:Added for charge calc in Autoresume_newline var IN1 = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline var Out1 = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline IN1.SetProperty("ObjectId",strOrderId);_newline bsUtil = TheApplication().GetService("Voluntary_ussus_usRu");_newline bsUtil.InvokeMethod("CalcResumpFee",IN1,Out1);_newline }_newline else if("Suspend" == strOLIActionCode || "Resume" == strOLIActionCode)//root bundle _newline {//if the asset status is already final status then internally complete the order _newline strCurrAssetStatus = bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Asset Status"); _newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Change Reason",strChangeReason); _newline if(("Suspended"==strStatus && "Suspend"==strOLIActionCode)) _newline isOrderForInternalCompletion=true; _newline bcOLI.WriteRecord(); _newline } _newline isRec=bcOLI.NextRecord(); _newline } _newline if(isOrderForInternalCompletion) _newline { _newline//mark the OLI as Complete _newline bcOLI.ClearToQuery(); _newline bcOLI.SetSearchExpr("[Action Code]='Suspend' OR [Action Code]='Resume'"); _newline bcOLI.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline isRec=bcOLI.FirstRecord(); _newline while(isRec) _newline { _newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue("Status","Complete"); _newline bcOLI.WriteRecord(); _newline isRec=bcOLI.NextRecord();//1.1 _newline } _newline//mark the order as complete only if no other OLI (like charges) _newline } _newline//submit the order _newline try _newline { _newline psOp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline psIp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline psIp.SetProperty("RowId", strOrderId); _newline psIp.SetProperty("Fulfillment Mode","Deliver");//1.2 _newline psIp.SetProperty("ProcessName", "SISOMBillingSubmitOrderWebService"); _newline bsUtil = TheApplication().GetService("Workflow Process Manager"); _newline psOp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet(); _newline bsUtil.InvokeMethod("RunProcess", psIp, psOp); _newline strErrCode = "OK"; _newline strErrMesg = "Order submitted successfully."; _newline } _newline catch(e) _newline { _newline strErrCode = "ORDER_usSUBMIT_usERROR"; _newline strErrMesg = e.errCode + ":" + e.errText; _newline } _newline } _newline } _newline } _newline } _newline psIp = null; _newline psOp = null; _newline bsUtil = null; _newline boMain = null; _newline bcOrd = null; _newline bcOLI = null; _newline Outputs.SetProperty("OrderId", strOrderId); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", strErrCode); _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", strErrMesg); _newline return CancelOperation; _newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usProcessSuspendResumeSub

Business_spcService_spcScript.Comments: 20111103:Enhanced to get the Price of SUB-DEBT edr
Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function func_usSetPrice(Inputs,Outputs)_newline{_newlinevar strProductName = Inputs.GetProperty("Product Name");_newline if(""==strProductName)_newline {_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code","PROD_usNOT_usFOUND");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message","Product Do not Exist.");_newline }_newline else_newline_newlinevar boProd:BusObject = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Admin ISS Product Definition");_newline var bcProd:BusComp = boProd.GetBusComp("Internal Product - ISS Admin");_newline bcProd.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcProd.ClearToQuery();_newline bcProd.SetSearchExpr("[Name]='" + strProductName + "'");_newline bcProd.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcProd.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline var bcProdRel:BusComp = boProd.GetBusComp("Component Product");_newline bcProdRel.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcProdRel.ClearToQuery();_newline bcProdRel.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcProdRel.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline Inputs.SetProperty("Product Code", bcProdRel.GetFieldValue("Part #"));_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", "OK");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", "");_newline }_newlinevar boPrice:BusObject = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Admin Price List");_newlinevar bcPrice:BusComp = boPrice.GetBusComp("Price List Item");_newlinebcPrice.SetViewMode(AllView);_newlinebcPrice.ClearToQuery();_newline//var xyz = Inputs.GetProperty("Product Code");_newlinebcPrice.SetSearchExpr("[Part #]= '" + Inputs.GetProperty("Product Code") + "'");_newline//bcPrice.SetSearchExpr("[Product Name]= '" + Inputs.GetProperty("Product Name") + "'");_newline bcPrice.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcPrice.FirstRecord())_newline{_newlinevar strProductPrice = bcPrice.GetFieldValue("List Price");_newlineOutputs.SetProperty("Prd Price Subdebt",strProductPrice);_newline}_newline bcProdRel = null;_newline }_newline bcProd=null;_newlinebcPrice=null;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usSetPrice

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function func_usSubmitSuspendResumeSR(Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newline//since this will be called from specific WFP no need to check call type, existence of record etc._newline var strErrMesg="Could not process.",strErrCode="ERROR";_newline var boMain,bcSR;_newline var strSRId = Inputs.GetProperty("SR Id");_newline var dStartDate,dEndDate,dToday = new Date();_newline boMain = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Service Request");_newline bcSR = boMain.GetBusComp("Service Request");_newline bcSR.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcSR.ActivateMultipleFields(func_usMultiFields("Service Request"));_newline bcSR.ClearToQuery();_newline bcSR.SetSearchExpr("[Id]='" + strSRId + "'");_newline bcSR.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcSR.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline dStartDate = bcSR.GetFieldValue("CEM Planned Start Date");_newline dEndDate = bcSR.GetFieldValue("CEM Planned Completion Date");_newline//validate to check that the suspend and resume dates are in future_newline strErrMesg="Record found:" + dToday + ":" + dStartDate + ":" + dEndDate ;_newline strErrCode="WIP";_newline_newline//if all ok, mark the status as In Progress and let the RCR pick up the record_newline }_newline bcSR=null;_newline boMain=null;_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code",strErrCode);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message",strErrMesg);_newline return CancelOperation;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usSubmitSuspendResumeSR

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function func_usUpdateOLI(Inputs, Outputs)_newline{//to set specific fields based on search spec passed in_newline var strErrMesg="", strErrCode="OK";_newline var boMain,bcOLI,isRec;_newline var strSearchSpec = Inputs.GetProperty("SearchSpec");_newline var strFieldName = Inputs.GetProperty("FieldName");_newline var strFieldValue = Inputs.GetProperty("FieldValue");_newline boMain = TheApplication().GetBusObject("PDS Order Item");_newline bcOLI = boMain.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Line Items");_newline bcOLI.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcOLI.ActivateField(strFieldName);_newline bcOLI.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOLI.SetSearchExpr(strSearchSpec);_newline bcOLI.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline isRec = bcOLI.FirstRecord();_newline while(isRec)_newline {_newline bcOLI.SetFieldValue(strFieldName,strFieldValue);_newline isRec = bcOLI.NextRecord();_newline }_newline bcOLI = null;_newline boMain = null;_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", strErrCode);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", strErrMesg);_newline return CancelOperation;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usUpdateOLI

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function func_usValidateExistingOrder(Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newline var strToBeOrdIntId = Inputs.GetProperty("Ext Ref Id");_newline var strOrderId = "";_newline var boMain, bcOrd, strErrCode = "OK", strErrMesg ="";_newline boMain = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Order Entry (Sales)");_newline bcOrd = boMain.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Orders");_newline bcOrd.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcOrd.ActivateField("Status");_newline bcOrd.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOrd.SetSearchExpr("[Back Office Order Number]='" + strToBeOrdIntId + "'");_newline bcOrd.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if(bcOrd.FirstRecord())_newline {_newline strOrderId = bcOrd.GetFieldValue("Id");_newline strErrCode = "ORDER_usEXISTS_usFOR_usEDR";_newline strErrMesg = "Order for " + strToBeOrdIntId + " exists [Id: " + strOrderId + ", Status: " + bcOrd.GetFieldValue("Status") + "]";_newline }_newline bcOrd = null;_newline boMain = null;_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Order Id", strOrderId);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", strErrCode);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", strErrMesg);_newline return CancelOperation;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usValidateExistingOrder

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function func_usValidateSuspendResume(Inputs, Outputs)_newline{//check if for the current asset the number of successful user initiated suspensions in last one year are within permitted count or not_newline var strAssetIntegId = Inputs.GetProperty("Integration Id");_newline var strRequestType = Inputs.GetProperty("Request Type");_newline var strRequestSrc = Inputs.GetProperty("Request Source");_newline var strOpStatus = Inputs.GetProperty("Operating Status");_newline var strAssetStatus = Inputs.GetProperty("Asset Status");_newline var strProdType = Inputs.GetProperty("Product Type");_newline_newline var nActCount = 0;_newline var isRec;_newline var strErrMesg="", strErrCode="OK";_newline var nAllowCount = TheApplication().InvokeMethod("LookupValue","PERMITTED_usSUSP_usCOUNT","DEFAULT");_newline nAllowCount = ToInteger(nAllowCount);_newline if(0==nAllowCount) nAllowCount = 1;_newline var d1=new Date(),d2=new Date();_newline d1.setYear(d1.getYear()-1);_newline var dOLI;_newline_newline//find root OLI for the given AssetIntegId with Change Reason='User Initiated' and Status=Complete and due date within the last one year_newline var boMain,bcOLI;_newline if("Service Bundle"!=strProdType)_newline {_newline strErrCode="NOT_usALLOWED";_newline strErrMesg="Suspension, resumption is allowed only for Service Bundle type of assets. Selected asset type - " + strProdType + ".";_newline }_newline else if("Resume"==strRequestType && "Active"==strAssetStatus)_newline {_newline strErrCode="NOT_usALLOWED";_newline strErrMesg="Service is already Active, hence resumption not allowed.";_newline }_newline else if("Suspend"==strRequestType && "User"==strRequestSrc && "Suspended"==strAssetStatus && -1<strOpStatus.indexOf("User"))_newline {_newline strErrCode="SUSPENDED_usBY_usUSER";_newline strErrMesg="Service is already suspended upon user request.";_newline }_newline else if("Suspend"==strRequestType && "System"==strRequestSrc && "Suspended"==strAssetStatus && -1<strOpStatus.indexOf("System"))_newline {_newline strErrCode="SUSPENDED_usBY_usSYSTEM";_newline strErrMesg="Service is already suspended as per system policies.";_newline }_newline else if("Resume"==strRequestType && "User"==strRequestSrc && "Suspended"==strAssetStatus && 0>strOpStatus.indexOf("User"))_newline {_newline strErrCode="NOT_usSUSPENDED_usBY_usUSER";_newline strErrMesg="Service is not suspended by user request, hence resumption not allowed.";_newline }_newline else if("Resume"==strRequestType && "System"==strRequestSrc && "Suspended"==strAssetStatus && 0>strOpStatus.indexOf("System"))_newline {_newline strErrCode="NOT_usSUSPENDED_usBY_usSYSTEM";_newline strErrMesg="Service is not suspended by system policies, hence resumption not allowed.";_newline }_newline else if("Suspend"==strRequestType && "User"==strRequestSrc)_newline {_newline boMain = TheApplication().GetBusObject("PDS Order Item");_newline bcOLI = boMain.GetBusComp("Order Entry - Line Items");_newline bcOLI.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bcOLI.ActivateField("Due Date");_newline bcOLI.ClearToQuery();_newline bcOLI.SetSearchExpr("[Asset Integration Id]='" + strAssetIntegId + "' AND [Action Code]='Suspend' AND [Status]='Complete' AND [Change Reason]='User Initiated'");_newline bcOLI.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline isRec = bcOLI.FirstRecord();_newline while(isRec)_newline {_newline dOLI = new Date(bcOLI.GetFieldValue("Due Date"));_newline if(d1<dOLI && dOLI <=d2)//check date_newline nActCount++;_newline isRec = bcOLI.NextRecord();_newline }_newline if(nActCount>=nAllowCount)_newline {_newline strErrCode="NOT_usALLOWED";_newline strErrMesg="User initiated suspension has been executed " + nActCount + " times in last year, maximum permitted: " + nAllowCount+ ".";_newline }_newline }_newline bcOLI = null;_newline boMain = null;_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code", strErrCode);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message", strErrMesg);_newline return CancelOperation;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_usValidateSuspendResume

Business_spcService_spcScript.Comments: [Manasi S] Added new fuction for MS-OPS Release 8.2.5
Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function func_ussetPrimaryBalance(strOrderId)_newline{_newlinetry_newline{_newlinevar boOrd=TheApplication().GetBusObject("PDS Simplified Order");_newlinevar bcOrd=boOrd.GetBusComp("PDS Simplified Order Entry - Line Items");_newlinevar order_usid=strOrderId;_newlinebcOrd.ActivateField("Product");_newlinebcOrd.ActivateField("Net Price");_newlinebcOrd.ActivateField("VFQ Primary Balance");_newlinebcOrd.SetViewMode(AllView);_newlinebcOrd.ClearToQuery();_newlinebcOrd.SetSearchSpec("Order Header Id",order_usid);_newline//TheApplication().RaiseErrorText(order_usid);_newlinebcOrd.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newlinevar isR=bcOrd.FirstRecord();_newline_newlinewhile (isR)_newline{_newlinevar name=bcOrd.GetFieldValue("Product");_newlineif (name=='Freedom Replenishment 1' || name=='Freedom Replenishment 2' || name=='Freedom Replenishment 3' || name=='Freedom Replenishment 4' || name=='Freedom Replenishment 5' || name=='Freedom Replenishment 6' || name=='Freedom Replenishment 7' || name=='Freedom Replenishment 8' ||name=='Freedom Replenishment 9' || name=='Freedom Replenishment 10')_newline{_newlinevar value=bcOrd.GetFieldValue("Net Price");_newlinebcOrd.SetFieldValue("VFQ Primary Balance",value);_newlinebcOrd.WriteRecord();_newline}_newlineisR=bcOrd.NextRecord();_newline}_newline}_newlinecatch (e)_newline{_newline}_newlinefinally_newline{_newlineisR=null;_newlinebcOrd=null;_newlineboOrd=null;_newline}_newlinereturn;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: func_ussetPrimaryBalance

Business_spcService_spcScript.Comments: [Mayank][For Checking if the MSISDN is having Active Black Berry Serivce]
Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function mCheckBlackBerryService(inRootId , Outputs )_newline{_newline try_newline {_newline Outputs.SetProperty("For root" ,inRootId );_newline var strErrCode = "OK";_newline var strErrMesg = "";_newline var vSearchExpr = "";_newline var vIsBB = "N";_newline var vFirstRec = "";_newline_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Non Camel" , "" );_newline Outputs.SetProperty("BB Service" , "" );_newline _newline var vAssetBO = TheApplication().GetBusObject("SWI Asset Mgmt - Asset (Order Mgmt)");_newline var vAssetBC = vAssetBO.GetBusComp("SWI Asset Mgmt - Asset (Order Mgmt)");_newline _newline vAssetBC.ActivateField("Root Asset Id");_newline vAssetBC.ActivateField("Service Type");_newline vAssetBC.ActivateField("Status");_newline _newline vAssetBC.ClearToQuery();_newline _newline vAssetBC.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline vSearchExpr = "[Root Asset Id] = '"+inRootId+"' AND [Status] = 'Active' AND ( [Service Type] = 'BB Services' OR [Service Type] = 'Non Camel Roaming' )";_newline _newline _newline vAssetBC.SetSearchExpr(vSearchExpr );_newline Outputs.SetProperty(" vSearchExpr for sp ",vSearchExpr );_newline_newline vAssetBC.ExecuteQuery( ForwardOnly );_newline_newline vFirstRec = vAssetBC.FirstRecord();_newline //TheApplication().RaiseErrorText(vFirstRec);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("for match counr of service ",vAssetBC.CountRecords() ); _newline if ( vFirstRec )_newline {_newline _newline while ( vFirstRec )_newline {_newline Outputs.SetProperty("whle checking for bbi ","in loop");_newline if ( vAssetBC.GetFieldValue("Service Type") == "BB Services" )_newline {_newline Outputs.SetProperty("BB Service", "TRUE" );_newline }_newline else_newline if( vAssetBC.GetFieldValue("Service Type") == "Non Camel Roaming" )_newline {_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Non Camel", "TRUE" );_newline } _newline _newline vFirstRec = vAssetBC.NextRecord();_newline _newline } _newline _newline }_newline Outputs.SetProperty(" vAssetBC count out ", vAssetBC.CountRecords() ); _newline _newline _newline }_newline catch(e)_newline {_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code" , e.errCode);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message" , e.toString());_newline }_newline finally_newline {_newline vAssetBC = null;_newline vAssetBO = null;_newline }_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: mCheckBlackBerryService

Business_spcService_spcScript.Comments: [Mayank][For ALU EDRs]
Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function mCheckPostPaidProfile (inAccntId ,Outputs )_newline{_newline try_newline {_newline var vProfileBO = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Com Invoice Profile");_newline var vProfileBC = vProfileBO.GetBusComp("Com Invoice Profile");_newline var vFirstRecord = ""; _newline var vPaymentType = "Prepaid";_newline vProfileBC.ActivateField("Payment Type");_newline vProfileBC.ActivateField("Account Id");_newline vProfileBC.ActivateField("Status");_newline vProfileBC.ClearToQuery();_newline vProfileBC.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline_newline vProfileBC.SetSearchSpec("Account Id" , inAccntId ); _newline vProfileBC.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly); _newline vFirstRecord = vProfileBC.FirstRecord();_newline_newline while (vFirstRecord )_newline {_newline if( vProfileBC.GetFieldValue("Payment Type") == "Postpaid" && vProfileBC.GetFieldValue("Status") != "Inactive" )_newline {_newline vPaymentType = "Postpaid"; _newline break;_newline }_newline_newline vFirstRecord = vProfileBC.NextRecord();_newline }_newline_newline_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Payment Type" , vPaymentType );_newline _newline }_newline catch(e)_newline {_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code" , e.errCode);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message" , e.toString());_newline }_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: mCheckPostPaidProfile

Business_spcService_spcScript.Comments: [Mayank For Getting Info from MSISDN/Account]
Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function mGetBillProfileId(vAccount_usNumber , inMSISDN , Outputs )_newline{_newline try_newline {_newline var vAccountBO = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Account");_newline var vAccountBC = vAccountBO.GetBusComp("Account");_newline var vBAssetBC = vAccountBO.GetBusComp("Asset Mgmt - Asset");_newline var BillingProfileID = "";_newline var IsBlackBerry = "";_newline var vSearchExpr = "";_newline _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Code" , 0);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error Message" , "");
